$If you jump just as you land on a wall, you can
jump off of it.

Messages.Name: hint_all05_e00_sn
Messages.Text: $Hey there!

Messages.Name: hint_all05_e00_tl
Messages.Text: $Eggman's mechs!

Messages.Name: hint_all05_e00_kn
Messages.Text: $Looks like it's time to fight!

Messages.Name: hint_all05_e00_sd
Messages.Text: $Outta my way.

Messages.Name: hint_all05_e00_rg
Messages.Text: $There's someone here!

Messages.Name: hint_all05_e00_om
Messages.Text: $Dr. Eggman's mechs. Destroy!

Messages.Name: hint_all05_e00_am
Messages.Text: $Bad guys!

Messages.Name: hint_all05_e00_bz
Messages.Text: $What a nuisance.

Messages.Name: hint_all05_e00_sv
Messages.Text: $Get outta my way!

Messages.Name: hint_all05_e01_sn
Messages.Text: $These guys never learn. Let's go!

Messages.Name: hint_all05_e01_tl
Messages.Text: $Woah! Eggman's mechs are everywhere!

Messages.Name: hint_all05_e01_kn
Messages.Text: $There's still this many left!?

Messages.Name: hint_all05_e01_sd
Messages.Text: $Ha! There's no strength in numbers.

Messages.Name: hint_all05_e01_rg
Messages.Text: $There you are!

Messages.Name: hint_all05_e01_om
Messages.Text: $Do they think they can defeat me!?

Messages.Name: hint_all05_e01_am
Messages.Text: $Huh! Are you kidding me!?

Messages.Name: hint_all05_e01_bz
Messages.Text: $Did they think they'd stop me with this?

Messages.Name: hint_all05_e01_sv
Messages.Text: $This is useless against me!

Messages.Name: hint_all05_e02_sn
Messages.Text:
$Piece of cake!
No sweat.

Messages.Name: hint_all05_e02_tl
Messages.Text: $That was tough.

Messages.Name: hint_all05_e02_kn
Messages.Text: $*phew* Good riddance.

Messages.Name: hint_all05_e02_sd
Messages.Text: $It's not over. I can't let down my guard!

Messages.Name: hint_all05_e02_rg
Messages.Text: $That's how it's done.

Messages.Name: hint_all05_e02_om
Messages.Text: $Elimination complete.

Messages.Name: hint_all05_e02_am
Messages.Text: $*phew* Did it!

Messages.Name: hint_all05_e02_bz
Messages.Text: $What a waste of time.

Messages.Name: hint_all05_e02_sv
Messages.Text: $Well, I guess that's done.

Messages.Name: hint_all05_e03_sn
Messages.Text: $I'll get rid of them all!

Messages.Name: hint_all05_e03_tl
Messages.Text: $First we've got to defeat all the mechs!

Messages.Name: hint_all05_e03_kn
Messages.Text: $Bring it on, I'll take them all down!

Messages.Name: hint_all05_e03_sd
Messages.Text: $I'll get rid of every last one!

Messages.Name: hint_all05_e03_rg
Messages.Text: $We can take them all on!

Messages.Name: hint_all05_e03_om
Messages.Text: $Dr. Eggman's mechs. Annihilate!

Messages.Name: hint_all05_e03_am
Messages.Text: $I'll destroy all of you!

Messages.Name: hint_all05_e03_bz
Messages.Text: $I'll take you all on!

Messages.Name: hint_all05_e03_sv
Messages.Text: $I'll take care of all of you.

Messages.Name: hint_all05_a00_sn
Messages.Text:
$The Homing Smash can blow away whole groups
of enemies.

Messages.Name: hint_all05_a00_sd
Messages.Text:
$The Chaos Spear paralyzes enemies on walls,
and in midair. It'll drop them to the ground.

Messages.Name: hint_all05_a00_sv
Messages.Text:
$Psychokinesis can grab bullets, and send them
flying right back.

Messages.Name: hint_all05_a01_sn
Messages.Text:
$The Homing Smash can crush enemy defenses
and barriers.

Messages.Name: hint_all05_a01_sd
Messages.Text:
$The Chaos Spear can neutralize special enemy
effects.

Messages.Name: hint_all05_a01_sv
Messages.Text:
$Psycho Shock works against groups of enemies,
and can paralyze them.

Messages.Name: hint_all05_a02_sd
Messages.Text:
$I can boost my attacks to blow away whole
groups of enemies.

Messages.Name: hint_all05_a02_sv
Messages.Text:
$If I can paralyze them, I can grab them all with
my Psychokinesis and throw them.

Messages.Name: hint_all05_a03_sd
Messages.Text:
$I can boost my attacks to crush enemy defenses
and barriers.

Messages.Name: hint_all05_a04_sn
Messages.Text:
$The Vulcan Cannon shots don't hurt individually,
but they'll cut down my Rings bit by bit.

Messages.Name: hint_all05_a04_tl
Messages.Text:
$The Vulcan Cannon shots aren't a big deal by
themselves but you'll lose your Rings bit by bit.

Messages.Name: hint_all05_a04_kn
Messages.Text:
$The Vulcan Cannon shots don't hurt too much,
but you'll lose your Rings bit by bit.
Be careful.

Messages.Name: hint_all05_a04_sd
Messages.Text:
$The Vulcan Cannon shots don't hurt much, but
I'll lose Rings bit by bit. I've got to be careful.

Messages.Name: hint_all05_a04_rg
Messages.Text:
$The Vulcan Cannon shots aren't a big deal, but
you'll lose your Rings little by little.

Messages.Name: hint_all05_a04_om
Messages.Text:
$The Vulcan Canon does little damage but you
need to be careful. You will lose Rings.

Messages.Name: hint_all05_a05_am
Messages.Text:
$You can't grab Vulcan Cannon shots, but you
can block them with your Psychokinesis.

Messages.Name: hint_all05_a05_bz
Messages.Text:
$You can't grab Vulcan Cannon shots, but you
can block them with your Psychokinesis.

Messages.Name: hint_all05_a05_sv
Messages.Text:
$I can't grab Vulcan Cannon shots, but I
can block them with my Psychokinesis.

Messages.Name: hint_all05_a06_sn
Messages.Text:
$Those missiles home in on you,
and they explode on impact.
If they lock on, I've got to shake them.

Messages.Name: hint_all05_a06_tl
Messages.Text:
$Those are Guided Missiles. What's more, they
explode on impact. If they lock on to you,
you've got to shake them.

Messages.Name: hint_all05_a06_kn
Messages.Text:
$Those Guided Missiles will explode on impact.
If they lock on to you, you have to shake them
off.

Messages.Name: hint_all05_a06_sd
Messages.Text:
$Those missiles are guided, and they explode on
impact. If they lock on, I need to shake them off.

Messages.Name: hint_all05_a06_rg
Messages.Text:
$Those missiles are guided. What's more, they 
explode on impact. If they lock on to you,
you've got to shake them off.

Messages.Name: hint_all05_a06_om
Messages.Text:
$Those missiles are guided. They
explode on impact. If they lock on to you,
you must lose them.

Messages.Name: hint_all05_a07_am
Messages.Text:
$You can use your Psychokinesis to grab
missiles and throw them back to attack
the enemy.

Messages.Name: hint_all05_a07_bz
Messages.Text:
$You can use your Psychokinesis to grab
missiles and throw them back, to make them
explode near the enemy.

Messages.Name: hint_all05_a07_sv
Messages.Text:
$I can grab missiles with Psychokinesis and
throw them back, to make them explode
near the enemy.

Messages.Name: hint_all05_a08_sn
Messages.Text:
$The Laser Shots are fast.
I've got to dodge at the same time they're fired!

Messages.Name: hint_all05_a08_tl
Messages.Text:
$The Laser Shots are fast, so
when they're fired, dodge quickly!

Messages.Name: hint_all05_a08_kn
Messages.Text:
$The Laser Shots are fast. If you don't
dodge the instant they're fired, you'll get hit.

Messages.Name: hint_all05_a08_sd
Messages.Text:
$The Laser Shots are fast.
I've got to dodge at the same time they're fired.

Messages.Name: hint_all05_a08_rg
Messages.Text:
$The Laser Shots are extremely fast.
When they're fired, dodge at the same time!

Messages.Name: hint_all05_a08_om
Messages.Text:
$The Laser Shots are fast. 
Dodge at the same time the guns are discharged.

Messages.Name: hint_all05_a09_am
Messages.Text:
$Psychokinesis doesn't work against lasers.
When they shoot, just avoid them!

Messages.Name: hint_all05_a09_bz
Messages.Text:
$Psychokinesis has no effect against lasers.
Looks like you can only avoid them.

Messages.Name: hint_all05_a09_sv
Messages.Text:
$I can't grab lasers with my Psychokinesis .
It looks like I can only avoid them.

Messages.Name: hint_all05_a10_sn
Messages.Text:
$They'll charge in without warning. I've got to jump
out of the way, then counterattack.

Messages.Name: hint_all05_a10_tl
Messages.Text:
$Be careful!
They'll charge suddenly.
When they do, jump out of the way!

Messages.Name: hint_all05_a10_kn
Messages.Text:
$They'll charge suddenly!
Jump to dodge and counterattack!

Messages.Name: hint_all05_a10_sd
Messages.Text:
$They'll charge without warning. I need to get out
of the way, then counterattack.

Messages.Name: hint_all05_a10_rg
Messages.Text:
$Watch out for their charges.
When they attack, dodge and counterattack.

Messages.Name: hint_all05_a10_om
Messages.Text:
$You need to be wary of their charge. 
Dodge and counterattack.

Messages.Name: hint_all05_a10_am
Messages.Text:
$Watch out for their charge!
After dodging the attack, counterattack.

Messages.Name: hint_all05_a10_bz
Messages.Text:
$Be careful, they'll charge in suddenly.
Dodge the attack and counterattack!

Messages.Name: hint_all05_a10_sv
Messages.Text:
$I've got to watch out for charging attacks.
I need to dodge, then counterattack.

Messages.Name: hint_all05_a11_sn
Messages.Text:
$Normal attacks won't work against the shield.
I've got to attack when the defenses drop.

Messages.Name: hint_all05_a11_tl
Messages.Text:
$Regular attacks won't work while the shield
is in place. Attack when the defenses are
lowered.

Messages.Name: hint_all05_a11_kn
Messages.Text:
$Regular attacks won't work while the shield
is in place. Attack when the defenses are
lowered.

Messages.Name: hint_all05_a11_sd
Messages.Text:
$Normal attacks won't work against the shield.
I've got to attack when the defenses are down.

Messages.Name: hint_all05_a11_rg
Messages.Text:
$Attacks are useless while the shields are in
place. Attack the instant the defenses are
lowered.

Messages.Name: hint_all05_a11_om
Messages.Text:
$Regular attacks are ineffective while the shields
are in place. Attack when the defenses are
lowered.

Messages.Name: hint_all05_a11_am
Messages.Text:
$Attacks are useless while the shields are in
place. Attack when the defenses are down!

Messages.Name: hint_all05_a11_bz
Messages.Text:
$Regular attacks are ineffective while the shields
are in place. Attack when the defenses are
lowered.

Messages.Name: hint_all05_a11_sv
Messages.Text:
$Normal attacks won't work while the shields are
in place. I've got to attack when the defenses
are lowered.

Messages.Name: hint_all05_a12_sn
Messages.Text:
$If I find the one issuing orders and defeat him,
I can defeat everyone at once.

Messages.Name: hint_all05_a12_tl
Messages.Text:
$There is a leader giving orders to the mechs. If
you find it you can defeat them all at once!

Messages.Name: hint_all05_a12_kn
Messages.Text:
$If you find the one issuing orders and defeat
him, then you can defeat everyone at once.

Messages.Name: hint_all05_a12_sd
Messages.Text:
$Their command systems are linked... 
If I take out the leader, then they'll all fall.

Messages.Name: hint_all05_a12_rg
Messages.Text:
$Their command systems are linked. If you
defeat the leader, maybe they'll all go down.

Messages.Name: hint_all05_a12_om
Messages.Text:
$Their command systems are linked to the leader.
Destroy the leader.

Messages.Name: hint_all05_a12_am
Messages.Text:
$If you take out the one giving orders, then you
can beat everyone at once!

Messages.Name: hint_all05_a12_bz
Messages.Text:
$If you defeat the one issuing orders, then you
can defeat everyone at once.

Messages.Name: hint_all05_a12_sv
Messages.Text:
$If I can take out the one giving orders,
the rest of them will go down, too.

Messages.Name: hint_all05_a13_sn
Messages.Text:
$If I do a Homing Attack on that robot, I'll
be able to reach the other side.

Messages.Name: hint_all05_a13_tl
Messages.Text:
$If you use a Homing Attack on that robot, you'll
be able to reach the other side.

Messages.Name: hint_all05_a13_kn
Messages.Text:
$If you use a Homing Attack on that robot, you'll
be able to reach the other side.

Messages.Name: hint_all05_a13_sd
Messages.Text:
$If I use that robot, it looks like I can move
forward.

Messages.Name: hint_all05_a13_rg
Messages.Text: $If you use that robot, you can move forward.

Messages.Name: hint_all05_a13_om
Messages.Text:
$If you use that robot, maybe you can move
forward.

Messages.Name: hint_all05_a13_am
Messages.Text:
$You should be able to grab that flying robot's
attacks with your power, right?

Messages.Name: hint_all05_a13_bz
Messages.Text:
$You can use your power to grab attacks
from flying mechs, and counterattack.

Messages.Name: hint_all05_a13_sv
Messages.Text:
$I can grab attacks from flying mechs with
my Psychokinesis, and counterattack.

Messages.Name: hint_all05_a14_sn
Messages.Text:
$Normal attacks won't work while the barriers
are in place. I've got to attack the instant the
defenses are lowered.

Messages.Name: hint_all05_a14_tl
Messages.Text:
$Regular attacks won't work while the barriers
are in place. Attack when the defenses are
lowered.

Messages.Name: hint_all05_a14_kn
Messages.Text:
$Attacks are useless while the barriers are
in place. Attack the instant the defenses are
lowered.

Messages.Name: hint_all05_a14_sd
Messages.Text:
$Regular attacks won't work while the barriers
are in place. The only chance to attack is while
the defenses are lowered.

Messages.Name: hint_all05_a14_rg
Messages.Text:
$Attacks are useless while the barriers are in
place. Attack the instant the defenses are
lowered.

Messages.Name: hint_all05_a14_om
Messages.Text:
$Regular attacks are ineffective while the barriers
are in place. Attack when the defenses are
lowered.

Messages.Name: hint_all05_a14_am
Messages.Text:
$Attacks won't work with the barriers in
place. Attack when the defenses are lowered!

Messages.Name: hint_all05_a14_bz
Messages.Text:
$Attacks are useless while the barriers are in
place. The only chance to attack is while
the defenses are lowered.

Messages.Name: hint_all05_a14_sv
Messages.Text:
$Attacks are ineffective with the barriers in place.
I need to attack when the defenses are lowered.

Messages.Name: hint_all05_a15_sn
Messages.Text:
$If he notices me, it'll be a pain.
I've got to take him out before he sees me.

Messages.Name: hint_all05_a15_kn
Messages.Text:
$If it sees you, it'll be a pain.
You've got to defeat it before it finds you.

Messages.Name: hint_all05_a15_sd
Messages.Text:
$Dr. Eggman's lookout mech... 
I'd better take it out before it sees me.

Messages.Name: hint_all05_a15_om
Messages.Text:
$Warning, it will be troublesome if you are
discovered. Attack first.

Messages.Name: hint_all05_a15_bz
Messages.Text:
$There'll be trouble if you're discovered by that
lookout mech. Defeat it before it notices you.

Messages.Name: hint_all05_a15_sv
Messages.Text:
$If that lookout mech finds me, it'll be a pain.
I'd better take it out first.

Messages.Name: hint_all05_a16_tl
Messages.Text:
$That robot is a lookout. 
If it sees you, it'll call for reinforcements.

Messages.Name: hint_all05_a16_rg
Messages.Text:
$I think that robot is a lookout. If you're
discovered, it looks like it could be trouble.

Messages.Name: hint_all05_a16_am
Messages.Text:
$That robot's probably a lookout. If it sees you,
things could get messy.

Messages.Name: hint_all05_a17_sn
Messages.Text:
$I can't attack enemies if I can't see 'em. I've
got to wait 'til they show themselves.

Messages.Name: hint_all05_a17_tl
Messages.Text:
$You can't attack enemies you can't see.
So attack the instant they show themselves.

Messages.Name: hint_all05_a17_kn
Messages.Text:
$You can't attack enemies you can't see.
Your only chance is when they show themselves.

Messages.Name: hint_all05_a17_sd
Messages.Text:
$I can't attack enemies I can't see.
The only chance is when they show themselves.

Messages.Name: hint_all05_a17_rg
Messages.Text:
$You can't attack enemies you can't see. But they
have to show themselves at some point.

Messages.Name: hint_all05_a17_om
Messages.Text:
$Invisible enemies cannot be attacked. It's best 
to attack the instant they show themselves.

Messages.Name: hint_all05_a17_am
Messages.Text:
$You can't attack enemies you can't see. You
need to attack the instant they show themselves!

Messages.Name: hint_all05_a17_bz
Messages.Text:
$You can't attack enemies you can't see... 
Counterattack the moment they show themselves.

Messages.Name: hint_all05_a17_sv
Messages.Text:
$I can't attack enemies I can't see.
I'll have to wait 'til they show themselves.

Messages.Name: hint_all05_a18_sn
Messages.Text:
$That robot will toss bombs from the walls.
I've got to watch out!

Messages.Name: hint_all05_a18_tl
Messages.Text:
$That robot will throw bombs at you from the
walls. Be careful!

Messages.Name: hint_all05_a18_kn
Messages.Text:
$That robot will throw bombs at you from the
walls. You'd better watch out!

Messages.Name: hint_all05_a18_sd
Messages.Text:
$It looks like that robot tosses bombs from
the walls. I'd better watch out.

Messages.Name: hint_all05_a18_rg
Messages.Text:
$That robot will throw bombs at you from the
walls. Be careful!

Messages.Name: hint_all05_a18_om
Messages.Text:
$Watch out for that robot. It will throw bombs
at you while perched on the walls.

Messages.Name: hint_all05_a19_am
Messages.Text:
$You can use your Psychokinesis to grab and
throw that robot's bombs!

Messages.Name: hint_all05_a19_bz
Messages.Text:
$You can use your Psychokinesis to toss
back that robot's bombs.

Messages.Name: hint_all05_a19_sv
Messages.Text:
$I can use my Psychokinesis to grab that
robot's bombs, and throw them back.

Messages.Name: hint_all05_a20_sn
Messages.Text:
$Its armor is too strong for regular attacks... 
But I might be able to do some damage
if I turned it over.

Messages.Name: hint_all05_a20_tl
Messages.Text:
$Its armor can't be penetrated with regular
attacks... Turn it over and aim for a weak spot.

Messages.Name: hint_all05_a20_kn
Messages.Text:
$Its armor is too hard to use regular attacks.
How about turning it over and attacking
the other side?

Messages.Name: hint_all05_a20_sd
Messages.Text:
$Its armor looks pretty tough. I might be able to
flip it over, and then attack...

Messages.Name: hint_all05_a20_rg
Messages.Text:
$Its armor looks too strong for regular attacks... 
How about trying to turn it over and attacking?

Messages.Name: hint_all05_a20_om
Messages.Text:
$Its armor is tough. Regular attacks are futile.
The weak point is underneath. Try flipping it over.

Messages.Name: hint_all05_a20_am
Messages.Text:
$It looks like regular attacks won't get through
its armor. Try flipping it over and attacking!

Messages.Name: hint_all05_a20_bz
Messages.Text:
$Regular attacks are ineffective against its shell.
How about flipping it over?

Messages.Name: hint_all05_a20_sv
Messages.Text:
$Its armor looks pretty tough. I might be able to
flip it over, and then attack...

Messages.Name: hint_all05_a21_sn
Messages.Text:
$It looks like it's equipped with heavy weapons,
but those legs look pretty fragile.

Messages.Name: hint_all05_a21_tl
Messages.Text:
$It's equipped with some really heavy
weapons, so try to aim for the legs!

Messages.Name: hint_all05_a21_kn
Messages.Text:
$It's equipped with heavy weapons.
I bet its legs are under a lot of strain.

Messages.Name: hint_all05_a21_sd
Messages.Text:
$It looks like it's equipped with heavy weapons.
I bet those legs are fragile.

Messages.Name: hint_all05_a21_rg
Messages.Text:
$It looks like it's equipped with heavy weapons.
I bet its legs are pretty fragile.

Messages.Name: hint_all05_a21_om
Messages.Text:
$The legs are its weak spot.
Its equipment is so heavy that the legs are
under constant strain.

Messages.Name: hint_all05_a22_am
Messages.Text:
$If you take out its legs, it will be paralyzed.
Then use your Psychokinesis to grab it!

Messages.Name: hint_all05_a22_bz
Messages.Text:
$If you take out its legs, it will be paralyzed.
That's your chance to use your Psychokinesis.

Messages.Name: hint_all05_a22_sv
Messages.Text:
$Taking out its legs will paralyze it.
Then I can grab it with my Psychokinesis!

Messages.Name: hint_all05_a23_sn
Messages.Text:
$It's hard to attack while it's up in the sky.
It'll be easier to deal with when it charges in.

Messages.Name: hint_all05_a23_tl
Messages.Text:
$While it's in the sky, it's hard to attack.
Wait for it to come down!

Messages.Name: hint_all05_a23_kn
Messages.Text:
$While it's in the sky, it's hard to attack.
Attack when it comes down here.

Messages.Name: hint_all05_a23_sd
Messages.Text:
$I've got to dodge the Drill attacks, and
counterattack!

Messages.Name: hint_all05_a23_rg
Messages.Text:
$Watch out for the Drill attacks.
Dodge them, then counterattack!

Messages.Name: hint_all05_a23_om
Messages.Text:
$Warning: Drill attacks.
Dodge, then counterattack.

Messages.Name: hint_all05_a24_am
Messages.Text:
$If you dodge the Drill attack, you can use your
Psychokinesis to grab it while it's stuck in the
ground.

Messages.Name: hint_all05_a24_bz
Messages.Text:
$If you dodge the Drill attack, grab it with
your Psychokinesis as it's stuck in the ground.

Messages.Name: hint_all05_a24_sv
Messages.Text:
$If I dodge the Drill attack, I can grab it with
my Psychokinesis when it's stuck
in the ground.

Messages.Name: hint_all05_a25_sn
Messages.Text:
$When it's lost both arms, that's my chance.
It's got no balance, so I can knock it down
easily.

Messages.Name: hint_all05_a25_tl
Messages.Text:
$When it's lost both arms, that's your chance.
It'll be off balance, so you can knock it down.

Messages.Name: hint_all05_a25_kn
Messages.Text:
$When it's lost both arms, that's your chance.
It'll be off balance, so you can knock it down.

Messages.Name: hint_all05_a25_sd
Messages.Text:
$When it's lost both arms, that's my chance.
It'll be off balance, so I can knock it down.

Messages.Name: hint_all05_a25_rg
Messages.Text:
$When it's lost both arms, that's your chance.
It'll be off balance, so it'll fall down easily.

Messages.Name: hint_all05_a25_om
Messages.Text:
$Your chance is when it has lost both arms.
It will be off balance, so it will fall down easily.

Messages.Name: hint_all05_a26_am
Messages.Text:
$When it's lost both arms, attacking it will
knock it over. Then grab it with your
Psychokinesis.

Messages.Name: hint_all05_a26_bz
Messages.Text:
$When it's lost both arms, attacking it will knock
it over. Then grab hold of it with your
Psychokinesis.

Messages.Name: hint_all05_a26_sv
Messages.Text:
$When both arms are gone, I can attack it and
knock it over. That's my chance to grab it
with my Psychokinesis!

Messages.Name: hint_all05_a27_sn
Messages.Text:
$I've got to watch out! Those things will
crawl along the walls and ceiling, then jump
suddenly!

Messages.Name: hint_all05_a27_tl
Messages.Text:
$Those things will crawl along the walls
and ceilings then jump on you, so watch out!

Messages.Name: hint_all05_a27_kn
Messages.Text:
$Those things will crawl along the walls
and ceilings then jump on you, so watch out!

Messages.Name: hint_all05_a27_sd
Messages.Text:
$Those things will crawl along the walls
and ceilings then jump suddenly, so I'd better
watch out.

Messages.Name: hint_all05_a27_rg
Messages.Text:
$Those things will crawl along the walls
and ceilings then jump on you. Be careful.

Messages.Name: hint_all05_a27_om
Messages.Text:
$Analysis of behavior complete. Those objects
will crawl along the walls and ceiling,
then attempt to jump on you.

Messages.Name: hint_all05_a27_am
Messages.Text:
$Those things will crawl along the walls
and ceilings then jump on you, so be careful!

Messages.Name: hint_all05_a27_bz
Messages.Text:
$Those things will crawl along the walls
and ceilings then jump on you, so be careful.

Messages.Name: hint_all05_a27_sv
Messages.Text:
$I'd better watch out. Those things will crawl
along the walls and ceiling, then jump suddenly!

Messages.Name: hint_all05_a28_sn
Messages.Text:
$If I use a Homing Attack on that monster,
I'll be able to reach the other side.

Messages.Name: hint_all05_a28_tl
Messages.Text:
$If you use a Homing Attack on that monster,
won't you be able to reach the other side?

Messages.Name: hint_all05_a28_kn
Messages.Text:
$If you use a Homing Attack on that monster, I
wonder if you'll be able to reach the other side?

Messages.Name: hint_all05_a28_sd
Messages.Text:
$It looks like I can use that monster to move
ahead.

Messages.Name: hint_all05_a28_rg
Messages.Text:
$If you use that monster, it seems like you can
move forward.

Messages.Name: hint_all05_a28_om
Messages.Text: $To move forward, use that monster.

Messages.Name: hint_all05_a29_am
Messages.Text:
$You should be able to grab that flying monster's
attacks with your power, right?

Messages.Name: hint_all05_a29_bz
Messages.Text:
$You can use your power to grab the attacks of
that flying monster and counterattack.

Messages.Name: hint_all05_a29_sv
Messages.Text:
$I can grab that flying monster's attacks with
my Psychokinesis and counterattack.

Messages.Name: hint_all05_a30_sn
Messages.Text:
$When it opens its mouth, thatâ€™s my chance.
I've got to dodge, and counterattack.

Messages.Name: hint_all05_a30_tl
Messages.Text:
$When it opens its mouth, counterattack.
Don't forget to move out of the way!

Messages.Name: hint_all05_a30_kn
Messages.Text:
$Attack when it opens its mouth.
Oh, make sure to avoid its attack, too!

Messages.Name: hint_all05_a30_sd
Messages.Text: $When the mouth is open, that's my chance.

Messages.Name: hint_all05_a30_rg
Messages.Text: $Your chance to attack is when the mouth opens.

Messages.Name: hint_all05_a30_om
Messages.Text:
$When its mouth is open, commence attack.
Dodge its attack and counterattack.

Messages.Name: hint_all05_a30_am
Messages.Text: $Attack when its mouth is open!

Messages.Name: hint_all05_a30_bz
Messages.Text:
$Your only chance is when it opens its mouth.
Dodge, then counterattack.

Messages.Name: hint_all05_a30_sv
Messages.Text:
$When it opens its mouth, that's my chance.
I've got to dodge, then counterattack!

Messages.Name: hint_all05_a31_sn
Messages.Text:
$I've got to be careful if it goes underground, 
cause it'll burst forth to try and surprise me!

Messages.Name: hint_all05_a31_tl
Messages.Text:
$If he dives underground, be careful.
He'll suddenly burst out to attack!

Messages.Name: hint_all05_a31_kn
Messages.Text:
$If he dives underground, be on your guard.
He'll suddenly burst out to attack!

Messages.Name: hint_all05_a31_sd
Messages.Text:
$I need to be careful if he goes underground.
He'll suddenly burst out to attack!

Messages.Name: hint_all05_a31_rg
Messages.Text:
$If he dives underground, be careful.
He'll suddenly burst out to attack!

Messages.Name: hint_all05_a31_om
Messages.Text:
$If he dives underground, look out.
He will suddenly burst out to attack!

Messages.Name: hint_all05_a31_am
Messages.Text:
$If that robot dives underground, watch out.
He'll suddenly burst out to attack!

Messages.Name: hint_all05_a31_bz
Messages.Text:
$If he dives underground, be careful.
He'll suddenly burst out to attack!

Messages.Name: hint_all05_a31_sv
Messages.Text:
$I need to watch it if he goes underground.
He'll suddenly burst out to attack!

Messages.Name: hint_all05_a32_sn
Messages.Text:
$His weak point is the core of the head!
Got to hit it once it comes into view.

Messages.Name: hint_all05_a32_tl
Messages.Text:
$It seems his weak point is the core of the head!
Hit it once when it's visible!

Messages.Name: hint_all05_a32_kn
Messages.Text:
$The core of the head is his weak point!
Got to attack it when it appears.

Messages.Name: hint_all05_a32_sd
Messages.Text:
$The core of the head is his weak point!
Must attack when its core is exposed.

Messages.Name: hint_all05_a32_rg
Messages.Text:
$The core of the head is his weak point!
Hit him there and he should be toast.

Messages.Name: hint_all05_a32_om
Messages.Text:
$Structural weakness detected in head.
Core must be struck when exposed.

Messages.Name: hint_all05_a32_am
Messages.Text:
$The core of his head is his weak point.
When you see it, attack!

Messages.Name: hint_all05_a32_bz
Messages.Text:
$His weak point is the core of the head.
Attack him there when you can see it!

Messages.Name: hint_all05_a32_sv
Messages.Text:
$The core of the head is his weak point.
That's when I must attack!

Messages.Name: hint_all05_a33_sn
Messages.Text: $I guess I'll just get rid of these guys first.

Messages.Name: hint_all05_a33_tl
Messages.Text: $Let's get rid of these enemies first!

Messages.Name: hint_all05_a33_kn
Messages.Text: $Let's just get rid of these guys first.

Messages.Name: hint_all05_a33_sd
Messages.Text: $How annoying... I'll deal with them first.

Messages.Name: hint_all05_a33_rg
Messages.Text:
$These enemies are getting on my nerves!
How about getting rid of them first?

Messages.Name: hint_all05_a33_om
Messages.Text: $Set target priority to Dr. Eggman's robots.

Messages.Name: hint_all05_a33_am
Messages.Text: $How about we deal with these guys first?

Messages.Name: hint_all05_a33_bz
Messages.Text: $How about exterminating these things now?

Messages.Name: hint_all05_a33_sv
Messages.Text: $Let's clean up this trash!

Messages.Name: hint_all05_a33_pr
Messages.Text: $It's probably best to destroy these robots first.

Messages.Name: hint_all06_a02_sd
Messages.Text:
$This Buggy is equipped with special armor. With
this, you can break through obstacles.

Messages.Name: hint_all06_a02_rg
Messages.Text:
$This Buggy has specially developed GUN armor.
You should be able to crash into most obstacles
without worry.

Messages.Name: hint_all06_a06_sd
Messages.Text:
$I've got to watch how many bullets I have
remaining.  When I run out, it'll take time
to reload.

Messages.Name: hint_all06_a06_rg
Messages.Text:
$Watch your remaining bullets. 
If you run out, it'll take time to reload.

Messages.Name: hint_all06_a08_sd
Messages.Text:
$The Bike is lighter than the Buggy, and it's easier
to steer.

Messages.Name: hint_all06_a13_sd
Messages.Text:
$The Jet Glider doesn't have much armor.
I need to be careful about running into enemies
and the terrain.

Messages.Name: hint_all06_a17_sd
Messages.Text:
$This Hover Vehicle has the ability to levitate.
Now I can reach places I couldn't before.

Messages.Name: hint_all06_a18_sd
Messages.Text:
$I need to keep an eye on the remaining energy.
Once it's gone, it'll take time to reload.

Messages.Name: hint_all07_a00_sn
Messages.Text: $Leave it to me!

Messages.Name: hint_all07_a00_tl
Messages.Text: $Just leave it to me!

Messages.Name: hint_all07_a00_kn
Messages.Text: $Just leave it to me!

Messages.Name: hint_all07_a00_sd
Messages.Text: $Just leave it to me.

Messages.Name: hint_all07_a00_rg
Messages.Text: $Leave everything to me!

Messages.Name: hint_all07_a00_om
Messages.Text: $I will do it.

Messages.Name: hint_all07_a00_am
Messages.Text: $Leave it to me!

Messages.Name: hint_all07_a00_bz
Messages.Text: $Leave this to me.

Messages.Name: hint_all07_a00_sv
Messages.Text: $Leave it to me!

Messages.Name: hint_all07_a01_sn
Messages.Text: $Uh oh. How about a little help?

Messages.Name: hint_all07_a01_tl
Messages.Text: $Oh, no! Help!

Messages.Name: hint_all07_a01_kn
Messages.Text: $Hey! Hurry up and help me!

Messages.Name: hint_all07_a01_sd
Messages.Text: $Tsk. Give me a hand here.

Messages.Name: hint_all07_a01_rg
Messages.Text:
$C'mon! What are you doing!
Hurry up and help me!

Messages.Name: hint_all07_a01_om
Messages.Text: $Requesting assistance.

Messages.Name: hint_all07_a01_am
Messages.Text: $Help meeee!

Messages.Name: hint_all07_a01_bz
Messages.Text: $Sorry, could you give me a hand?

Messages.Name: hint_all07_a01_sv
Messages.Text: $This isn't good...

Messages.Name: hint_all07_a02_sn
Messages.Text: $Thanks!

Messages.Name: hint_all07_a02_tl
Messages.Text: $Thank you!

Messages.Name: hint_all07_a02_kn
Messages.Text: $Thanks, you were a big help.

Messages.Name: hint_all07_a02_sd
Messages.Text: $Hrmph, I didn't need your help.

Messages.Name: hint_all07_a02_rg
Messages.Text: $I owe you one.

Messages.Name: hint_all07_a02_om
Messages.Text: $I am grateful.

Messages.Name: hint_all07_a02_am
Messages.Text: $Thank you!

Messages.Name: hint_all07_a02_bz
Messages.Text: $Thanks for the help.

Messages.Name: hint_all07_a02_sv
Messages.Text: $Thank you.

Messages.Name: hint_all07_a03_sn
Messages.Text: $I'll take it from here!

Messages.Name: hint_all07_a03_tl
Messages.Text: $I'll go on from here!

Messages.Name: hint_all07_a03_kn
Messages.Text: $I'll go on ahead!

Messages.Name: hint_all07_a03_sd
Messages.Text: $I'll go on ahead from here.

Messages.Name: hint_all07_a03_rg
Messages.Text: $Leave the rest to me.

Messages.Name: hint_all07_a03_om
Messages.Text: $From here it is logical for me to go.

Messages.Name: hint_all07_a03_am
Messages.Text: $Leave the rest to me!

Messages.Name: hint_all07_a03_bz
Messages.Text: $I'll go ahead here.

Messages.Name: hint_all07_a03_sv
Messages.Text: $I'll go on ahead.

Messages.Name: hint_all07_a04_sn
Messages.Text: $Hey, not bad.

Messages.Name: hint_all07_a04_tl
Messages.Text: $Nice work!

Messages.Name: hint_all07_a04_kn
Messages.Text: $Good job.

Messages.Name: hint_all07_a04_sd
Messages.Text: $Not bad.

Messages.Name: hint_all07_a04_rg
Messages.Text: $Good job.

Messages.Name: hint_all07_a04_am
Messages.Text: $Great!

Messages.Name: hint_all07_a04_bz
Messages.Text: $Nice job.

Messages.Name: hint_all07_a04_sv
Messages.Text: $Good job.

Messages.Name: hint_all08_e00_sn
Messages.Text:
$It looks like Dr. Eggman is after the Chaos
Emeralds again. $Shadow, we're in this one together!

Messages.Name: hint_all08_e00_sd
Messages.Text:
$So I'm stuck working with you... 
Don't slow me down, Sonic.

Messages.Name: hint_all08_e01_sn
Messages.Text:
$There are 6 emeralds left.
Hurry!

Messages.Name: hint_all08_e02_sd
Messages.Text:
$There's probably an emerald here, too.
Don't fall behind!

Messages.Name: hint_all08_e03_sn
Messages.Text:
$There are 4 emeralds left.
Let's get moving!

Messages.Name: hint_all08_e04_sd
Messages.Text:
$Heh, the doctor never learns, does he?
Hurry, there are 3 emeralds left.

Messages.Name: hint_all08_e05_sn
Messages.Text:
$Eggman's attacks are getting worse.
Don't let them do you in!

Messages.Name: hint_all08_e06_sd
Messages.Text: $Heh, I'll show you my ultimate power!

Messages.Name: hint_all08_e07_sn
Messages.Text:
$Piece of cake!
Let's do this again sometime.

Messages.Name: hint_all08_e07_sd
Messages.Text: $I told you, didn't I? I'm the ultimate power.

Messages.Name: hint_all08_e08_sn
Messages.Text: $We'll have to work together here.

Messages.Name: hint_all08_e09_sn
Messages.Text: $Thanks, Shadow!

Messages.Name: hint_all08_e09_sd
Messages.Text: $Nice job, Sonic.

Messages.Name: hint_all08_e10_sn
Messages.Text:
$I can't believe I got caught in a trap.
I'm counting on you, Shadow.

Messages.Name: hint_all08_e10_sd
Messages.Text:
$I can't believe this... 
I'll leave it up to you, Sonic.

Messages.Name: hint_all08_e11_sn
Messages.Text: $I'll take you all on!

Messages.Name: hint_all08_e11_sd
Messages.Text: $Outta my way.

Messages.Name: hint_all08_e12_sn
Messages.Text: $There they are!

Messages.Name: hint_all08_e12_sd
Messages.Text: $Here they come!

Messages.Name: hint_all08_e13_sn
Messages.Text: $Hey, you're late.

Messages.Name: hint_all08_e13_sd
Messages.Text: $Pfft, about time you showed up.

Messages.Name: hint_all08_e14_sn
Messages.Text: $*phew* Nice job

Messages.Name: hint_all08_e14_sd
Messages.Text: $Heh. Good work.

Messages.Name: hint_all08_e15_sn
Messages.Text:
$This piece of junk... 
We'd be better off without it, wouldn't we?

Messages.Name: hint_all08_e15_sd
Messages.Text:
$I'll drive.
You take 'em down, Sonic!

Messages.Name: hint_all08_e16_eg
Messages.Text:
$The Chaos Emeralds are mine.
I'll defeat you two together!

Messages.Name: hint_all08_e17_eg
Messages.Text:
$Hah, there are still other emeralds.
I'll get them before you!

Messages.Name: hint_all08_e18_eg
Messages.Text:
$You're just in time.
I'll take those emeralds from you now.

Messages.Name: hint_all08_e19_eg
Messages.Text:
$You! I'll have the last laugh.
Remember that!

Messages.Name: hint_all08_e20_eg
Messages.Text:
$Hahaha! Just as I calculated.
It was worth letting you go free.
Well then, hand over those emeralds here.

Messages.Name: hint_all08_e21_eg
Messages.Text:
$Sonic, Shadow,
The next time we meet, I'll...

Messages.Name: hint_all08_h00_so
Messages.Text: $This switch requires two to push it.

Messages.Name: hint_all08_h01_so
Messages.Text:
$If one gets on, and then another, it should
enable a powerful jump.

Messages.Name: hint_all08_h02_so
Messages.Text:
$If one operates it, it seems they can transport
another.

Messages.Name: hint_kdv01_a00_sd
Messages.Text: $I think I can knock that structure down.

Messages.Name: hint_kdv01_a00_sv
Messages.Text: $I think I can knock that structure down.

Messages.Name: hint_kdv01_a01_sv
Messages.Text: $That tower has a big crack in it.

Messages.Name: hint_kdv01_a02_sv
Messages.Text:
$Man, the staircase is damaged. 
Now I'll have to use my power.

Messages.Name: hint_kdv01_a03_sn
Messages.Text: $Whoa.

Messages.Name: hint_kdv01_a03_sd
Messages.Text: $Whoa.

Messages.Name: hint_kdv01_a03_sv
Messages.Text: $Ungh! This building's crumbling.

Messages.Name: hint_kdv01_a04_rg
Messages.Text: $You can use this vehicle to get across the lake.

Messages.Name: hint_kdv01_a05_sv
Messages.Text: $I can manage this cage with my power.

Messages.Name: hint_kdv01_a06_rg
Messages.Text:
$If you cut this chain, 
it will take them right out.

Messages.Name: hint_kdv01_a06_sv
Messages.Text: $The pendulum can probably take out that tower.

Messages.Name: hint_kdv01_a07_sv
Messages.Text: $That container might help me move forward.

Messages.Name: hint_kdv01_a08_sv
Messages.Text: $I might be able to levitate to that spring.

Messages.Name: hint_kdv01_e00_sd
Messages.Text: $The wind is strong in this valley.

Messages.Name: hint_kdv01_e01_sd
Messages.Text:
$What a far away place to set
the extraction point.

Messages.Name: hint_kdv01_e02_sn
Messages.Text:
$Silver, Blaze, we don't have time. 
Let's get to Elise right away.

Messages.Name: hint_kdv01_e02_sv
Messages.Text:
$Sonic, we don't have time. 
Let's get to Elise right away.

Messages.Name: hint_kdv01_e03_sv
Messages.Text:
$Rouge, 
Dr. Eggman's forces are coming after us.
Let's get to the extraction point right away.

Messages.Name: hint_kdv01_e04_sv
Messages.Text: $Darn it! I should have realized Eggman's scheme...

Messages.Name: hint_kdv01_e05_sn
Messages.Text: $Hmph! That's a lot of enemies.

Messages.Name: hint_kdv01_e05_sv
Messages.Text:
$Sonic, leave this up to me. 
You go after Elise.

Messages.Name: hint_kdv01_e06_sn
Messages.Text:
$Silver... 
It's all yours!

Messages.Name: hint_kdv01_e07_rg
Messages.Text:
$It looks like you need to find three keys
to move on. Leave it to me!

Messages.Name: hint_kdv01_e08_sd
Messages.Text: $Okay, let's get going.

Messages.Name: hint_kdv01_e09_sn
Messages.Text:
$No! 
We can't be stuck here.

Messages.Name: hint_kdv01_e09_sd
Messages.Text: $How does this work?

Messages.Name: hint_kdv01_e09_rg
Messages.Text:
$I wonder why Soleanna moved the castle
away from here?

Messages.Name: hint_kdv01_e10_sn
Messages.Text: $Riding the wind brings back fond memories!

Messages.Name: hint_kdv01_e10_rg
Messages.Text: $We're getting close to the extraction point.

Messages.Name: hint_kdv01_e11_rg
Messages.Text:
$This is Kingdom Valley.
Long ago, there was a royal castle here.

Messages.Name: hint_kdv01_h00_so
Messages.Text:
$If you do a Homing Attack on the round part 
of this statue, it will create a path of wind.

Messages.Name: hint_kdv01_h01_so
Messages.Text:
$Do a Homing Attack on that rope. 
It should whip you high in the air.

Messages.Name: hint_kdv01_h02_so
Messages.Text: $Grab onto the eagle to take a shortcut.

Messages.Name: hint_wvo01_a00_tl
Messages.Text:
$If you time it right on the jump ramp,
you can jump even higher!

Messages.Name: hint_wvo01_a01_sd
Messages.Text:
$I'll need a Hover Vehicle to get across
the ocean.

Messages.Name: hint_wvo01_e00_sn
Messages.Text: $Woo-hoo!

Messages.Name: hint_wvo01_e01_sn
Messages.Text: $Whoa, that's a big one.

Messages.Name: hint_wvo01_e02_sn
Messages.Text: $Whew! That was close.

Messages.Name: hint_wvo01_e03_sn
Messages.Text:
$Tails! 
Go ahead and push the gate switch
so he doesn't get out!

Messages.Name: hint_wvo01_e03_tl
Messages.Text:
$Okay, Sonic!
I'll be right back!

Messages.Name: hint_wvo01_e03_om
Messages.Text:
$Mephiles detected.
Position K31.
Pursue and engage.

Messages.Name: hint_wvo01_e04_sn
Messages.Text: $Tails, hurry up!

Messages.Name: hint_wvo01_e05_tl
Messages.Text: $Thanks for waiting, Sonic!

Messages.Name: hint_wvo01_e05_mf
Messages.Text:
$Hahaha! Welcome, Omega. 
It won't take much for me to deal with you.

Messages.Name: hint_wvo01_e06_sn
Messages.Text: $Thank you, Tails. You saved me!

Messages.Name: hint_wvo01_e07_tl
Messages.Text: $Sonic, Eggman's battleship went that way!

Messages.Name: hint_wvo01_e07_sd
Messages.Text: $Ok, we'll find Omega soon. Hang in there...

Messages.Name: hint_wvo01_e07_bz
Messages.Text:
$The "Iblis Trigger"... 
A blue hedgehog... Can it be true?
I need to find Silver fast!

Messages.Name: hint_wvo01_e08_sn
Messages.Text: $I've got to hurry and save Elise.

Messages.Name: hint_wvo01_e08_tl
Messages.Text:
$Elise is on that battleship? 
Wait up, we're coming!

Messages.Name: hint_wvo01_e09_sn
Messages.Text:
$Darn! We're not going to make it. 
Let's speed up!

Messages.Name: hint_wvo01_e09_sd
Messages.Text: $What about Omega?

Messages.Name: hint_wvo01_e10_tl
Messages.Text:
$Shoot. 
I have to let Sonic know right away!

Messages.Name: hint_wvo01_e10_eg
Messages.Text:
$Sonic! A pity you failed!
Here, you can take these instead of the princess.

Messages.Name: hint_wvo01_e11_sn
Messages.Text: $Elise... Hang in there.

Messages.Name: hint_wvo01_e12_sn
Messages.Text: $Soleanna's ocean is so beautiful.

Messages.Name: hint_wvo01_e12_bz
Messages.Text: $Darn! Why now?

Messages.Name: hint_wvo01_e13_sn
Messages.Text:
$Tails, we don't have time for that. 
Let's hurry!

Messages.Name: hint_tpj01_a00_sn
Messages.Text: $Let's run straight up!

Messages.Name: hint_tpj01_a01_sn
Messages.Text:
$It looks like I can grab that vine with the fruit
with a Homing Attack.

Messages.Name: hint_tpj01_a01_pr
Messages.Text: $Sonic, it looks like you can grab that vine!

Messages.Name: hint_tpj01_a02_sn
Messages.Text: $I'm going right up the middle!

Messages.Name: hint_tpj01_a03_sn
Messages.Text: $Let's keep going!

Messages.Name: hint_tpj01_a03_pr
Messages.Text: $Over there!

Messages.Name: hint_tpj01_a04_sn
Messages.Text: $Something might happen if I knock down that fruit.

Messages.Name: hint_tpj01_a04_rg
Messages.Text: $That fruit looks suspicious.

Messages.Name: hint_tpj01_a04_sv
Messages.Text: $I might be able to knock down that fruit.

Messages.Name: hint_tpj01_a04_pr
Messages.Text: $You might be able to knock down that fruit.

Messages.Name: hint_tpj01_a05_sn
Messages.Text: $I might be able to ride this turtle.

Messages.Name: hint_tpj01_a05_rg
Messages.Text: $It looks like you can get around on this turtle.

Messages.Name: hint_tpj01_a05_sv
Messages.Text: $I might be able to get around on this turtle.

Messages.Name: hint_tpj01_a05_pr
Messages.Text: $How about riding this turtle?

Messages.Name: hint_tpj01_a06_rg
Messages.Text: $We'd better go over it.

Messages.Name: hint_tpj01_a06_sv
Messages.Text: $It looks like we should go over it.

Messages.Name: hint_tpj01_a07_sv
Messages.Text: $This hanging ruin might be useful.

Messages.Name: hint_tpj01_a08_sv
Messages.Text: $Looks like I can use this to go up.

Messages.Name: hint_tpj01_a09_sv
Messages.Text: $If I can hit that ball with this...

Messages.Name: hint_tpj01_a10_sv
Messages.Text: $Is this for breaking walls?

Messages.Name: hint_tpj01_a11_rg
Messages.Text: $It looks like you can break this platform.

Messages.Name: hint_tpj01_a11_sv
Messages.Text: $This platform seems useful.

Messages.Name: hint_tpj01_a12_sn
Messages.Text: $This lotus can be used as a trampoline!

Messages.Name: hint_tpj01_a12_rg
Messages.Text: $This lotus will throw you high in the air.

Messages.Name: hint_tpj01_a12_sv
Messages.Text:
$It looks like this lotus will help me jump,
based on how long I charge my Psychokinesis.

Messages.Name: hint_tpj01_a13_sn
Messages.Text: $Gotta make sure I don't fall in the water.

Messages.Name: hint_tpj01_a13_rg
Messages.Text: $Don't want to fall in this water.

Messages.Name: hint_tpj01_a13_sv
Messages.Text: $Gotta be careful not to fall in.

Messages.Name: hint_tpj01_e00_sn
Messages.Text: $Let's rip!

Messages.Name: hint_tpj01_e01_rg
Messages.Text: $It's a pretty smooth ride.

Messages.Name: hint_tpj01_e02_sv
Messages.Text: $These are submerged ancient ruins...

Messages.Name: hint_tpj01_e03_pr
Messages.Text: $Sonic! To your left!

Messages.Name: hint_tpj01_e04_sn
Messages.Text: $Elise, are you alright?

Messages.Name: hint_tpj01_e05_pr
Messages.Text: $Sonic! To your right!

Messages.Name: hint_tpj01_e06_sn
Messages.Text: $Hang on tight!

Messages.Name: hint_tpj01_e07_rg
Messages.Text: $It looks like you need to take them down.

Messages.Name: hint_tpj01_e08_sv
Messages.Text: $This turtle is pretty useful, once you get it right.

Messages.Name: hint_tpj01_e09_pr
Messages.Text: $Sonic! Above you!

Messages.Name: hint_tpj01_e10_sn
Messages.Text: $There's a route here.

Messages.Name: hint_tpj01_e11_rg
Messages.Text: $You're last!

Messages.Name: hint_tpj01_e12_sv
Messages.Text: $I wish I could go up...

Messages.Name: hint_tpj01_e13_pr
Messages.Text: $Sonic! Look down!

Messages.Name: hint_tpj01_e14_sn
Messages.Text: $We're getting out of the cave!

Messages.Name: hint_tpj01_e15_sv
Messages.Text: $I've got to hurry!

Messages.Name: hint_tpj01_e16_pr
Messages.Text: $Ahhh!

Messages.Name: hint_tpj01_e17_pr
Messages.Text: $Ahhh!

Messages.Name: hint_tpj01_e18_sn
Messages.Text: $Oh? Is there a back road?

Messages.Name: hint_tpj01_e19_sn
Messages.Text: $Thank you, Elise!

Messages.Name: hint_tpj01_h00_so
Messages.Text:
$ If you use your Psychokinesis on the middle
of the log, it will move back.  Use it to destroy
walls and roll balls.

Messages.Name: hint_tpj01_h01_so
Messages.Text:
$If you put your power together, 
you will be able to walk on this water.

Messages.Name: hint_tpj01_h02_so
Messages.Text: $You can hang on vines, and swing on them.

Messages.Name: hint_tpj01_h03_so
Messages.Text:
$Use the fruit that's all around you
to call the turtle.

Messages.Name: hint_dtd01_a00_sd
Messages.Text:
$I have to be careful 
not to get caught up in this Sand Wave.

Messages.Name: hint_dtd01_a00_pr
Messages.Text: $Don't get caught up in this Sand Wave.

Messages.Name: hint_dtd01_a01_sd
Messages.Text:
$I guess they're not going to welcome me
into the ruins.

Messages.Name: hint_dtd01_a02_sd
Messages.Text: $It looks like these pillars will lead me to him.

Messages.Name: hint_dtd01_a03_am
Messages.Text:
$This ball counts down each time you touch it.
Be careful carrying it!

Messages.Name: hint_dtd01_a03_sv
Messages.Text:
$So I guess the lock will open if I put this ball
in that hole over there.

Messages.Name: hint_dtd01_a03_pr
Messages.Text: $This ball counts down every time you touch it.

Messages.Name: hint_dtd01_a04_sv
Messages.Text:
$I might be able to make a path leading up
if I use my power over there.

Messages.Name: hint_dtd01_a05_sd
Messages.Text: $These big statues look pretty fragile.

Messages.Name: hint_dtd01_e00_sd
Messages.Text: $I'll take him down, no matter what he does.

Messages.Name: hint_dtd01_e00_am
Messages.Text: $I feel it. Sonic was here.

Messages.Name: hint_dtd01_e00_pr
Messages.Text: $When I'm with Sonic, I feel stronger somehow.

Messages.Name: hint_dtd01_e01_pr
Messages.Text: $Ahhh! Sonic!

Messages.Name: hint_dtd01_e02_sn
Messages.Text: $Elise, hold on tight.

Messages.Name: hint_dtd01_e02_sd
Messages.Text: $I'll defeat Mephiles, no matter what.

Messages.Name: hint_dtd01_e02_pr
Messages.Text: $Yes.

Messages.Name: hint_dtd01_e03_sd
Messages.Text: $I'm starting to feel his presence. Let's go!

Messages.Name: hint_dtd01_e03_sv
Messages.Text: $Just you wait, "Iblis Trigger."

Messages.Name: hint_dtd01_e04_sd
Messages.Text: $Okay, let's charge ahead!

Messages.Name: hint_dtd01_e05_om
Messages.Text:
$Switch detected ahead.
I will push the switch.
Shadow, wait here.

Messages.Name: hint_dtd01_e05_am
Messages.Text: $Leave this up to me.

Messages.Name: hint_dtd01_e06_sd
Messages.Text: $Omega's done it. Let's move on.

Messages.Name: hint_dtd01_e06_am
Messages.Text: $Now you can move on, right?

Messages.Name: hint_dtd01_h00_so
Messages.Text:
$If you put your power together, 
you will be able to walk on this sand. 
But be careful, your power is limited.

Messages.Name: hint_wap01_a00_sn
Messages.Text:
$If I can move without being caught
by the searchlights, I'll be able to get
to Eggman faster.

Messages.Name: hint_wap01_a00_tl
Messages.Text:
$I think you can stop the searchlights if you
hit them with bombs.

Messages.Name: hint_wap01_a00_sd
Messages.Text:
$If I don't break the searchlights,
I won't be able to get outside.

Messages.Name: hint_wap01_a01_rg
Messages.Text:
$Hmm... 
1, 2, 3... There are 5 searchlights.

Messages.Name: hint_wap01_a01_sd
Messages.Text:
$Those searchlights seem solid.
I'll have to use missiles.

Messages.Name: hint_wap01_a02_rg
Messages.Text:
$You don't want to get caught in a searchlight. 
You're going to have to use Bombs.

Messages.Name: hint_wap01_a04_sv
Messages.Text: $If I use it right, this snowball can be a weapon.

Messages.Name: hint_wap01_e00_sn
Messages.Text: $Now that's a big snowball.

Messages.Name: hint_wap01_e01_tl
Messages.Text: $We're close to Eggman's place.

Messages.Name: hint_wap01_e01_sd
Messages.Text:
$Dr. Eggman... 
What is he up to this time?

Messages.Name: hint_wap01_e01_bz
Messages.Text:
$Hmph! Security's tight. 
You don't want to be discovered.
Be careful.

Messages.Name: hint_wap01_e01_sv
Messages.Text: $Where is the entrance to Eggman's base?

Messages.Name: hint_wap01_e02_sd
Messages.Text:
$It looks like the door up ahead
leads into the base.

Messages.Name: hint_wap01_e03_sn
Messages.Text: $Okay, let's head straight to Eggman's base!

Messages.Name: hint_wap01_e03_sd
Messages.Text:
$Dr. Eggman... 
I wonder what he's up to this time.

Messages.Name: hint_wap01_e04_sn
Messages.Text:
$Dang, there's no time.
Let's keep going.

Messages.Name: hint_wap01_e04_sv
Messages.Text: $Okay, a little further to go until the base.

Messages.Name: hint_wap01_e05_rg
Messages.Text: $Yeah! Now we can get out of the base.

Messages.Name: hint_wap01_e06_rg
Messages.Text:
$We got out of the base, but
security's really high... 
Let's see...

Messages.Name: hint_wap01_e07_bz
Messages.Text: $Eggman's base is ahead. Let's hurry!

Messages.Name: hint_wap01_e08_rg
Messages.Text:
$Haha. 
Dr. Eggman is no match for me.

Messages.Name: hint_wap01_e09_rg
Messages.Text: $Shadow, why you? $It's a request from the President.

Messages.Name: hint_wap01_e10_sd
Messages.Text:
$I didn't know that you were the agent
who failed to infiltrate the location.

Messages.Name: hint_wap01_e10_rg
Messages.Text: $Come on! Don't underestimate Rouge The Bat.

Messages.Name: hint_wap01_e11_sd
Messages.Text: $We don't need to stay long. Let's go.

Messages.Name: hint_wap01_e11_rg
Messages.Text:
$I got in successfully,
and got the treasure, too! $I was only a little slow getting out.

Messages.Name: hint_wap01_h00_so
Messages.Text:
$You need to destroy  5 searchlights
to open the door to the outside.

Messages.Name: hint_wap01_h01_so
Messages.Text:
$The searchlight pillars are solid. 
You'll need to use missiles.

Messages.Name: hint_csc01_a01_sn
Messages.Text: $It looks like I can jump from there.

Messages.Name: hint_csc01_a02_sn
Messages.Text: $Watch out! It's going to blow up!

Messages.Name: hint_csc01_a02_sd
Messages.Text: $You're in my way.

Messages.Name: hint_csc01_a03_sn
Messages.Text: $This lamp post... Maybe I can swing off of it?

Messages.Name: hint_csc01_a04_sd
Messages.Text:
$Grr... 
Can I get out?

Messages.Name: hint_csc01_a05_sd
Messages.Text: $So much debris!

Messages.Name: hint_csc01_a06_sn
Messages.Text: $That tornado's carrying a car!

Messages.Name: hint_csc01_a06_sv
Messages.Text:
$Blaze! 
Watch out for things flying out of the tornado.

Messages.Name: hint_csc01_a07_sn
Messages.Text: $Here comes a billboard!

Messages.Name: hint_csc01_a07_sv
Messages.Text:
$This steel bar has a green mark on it. 
If I use my Psychokinesis here...

Messages.Name: hint_csc01_a08_sv
Messages.Text: $That road doesn't look too solid.

Messages.Name: hint_csc01_a09_sv
Messages.Text: $I can wipe them out if I hit that pipe right.

Messages.Name: hint_csc01_a10_bz
Messages.Text:
$Use your Psychokinesis! You should have
no problem with the enemy's bullets!

Messages.Name: hint_csc01_a11_bz
Messages.Text:
$It looks like you can take advantage of
this concrete ramp.

Messages.Name: hint_csc01_e00_sn
Messages.Text: $Shadow, don't be late!

Messages.Name: hint_csc01_e00_sd
Messages.Text: $Heh, you're talking to me?

Messages.Name: hint_csc01_e01_sn
Messages.Text: $Shadow...

Messages.Name: hint_csc01_e01_sd
Messages.Text: $Huuh.. Will I make it?

Messages.Name: hint_csc01_e02_sn
Messages.Text: $Okay, let's blast through here!

Messages.Name: hint_csc01_e02_sd
Messages.Text: $Sonic, let's hurry!

Messages.Name: hint_csc01_e03_sn
Messages.Text: $Hang on, Shadow.

Messages.Name: hint_csc01_e03_sd
Messages.Text: $Whoa...

Messages.Name: hint_csc01_e04_sn
Messages.Text: $It's gonna blow!

Messages.Name: hint_csc01_e04_sd
Messages.Text: $Get out of my way!

Messages.Name: hint_csc01_e04_bz
Messages.Text: $We need to go across the buildings.

Messages.Name: hint_csc01_e04_sv
Messages.Text: $Don't get in my way!

Messages.Name: hint_csc01_e05_sn
Messages.Text: $Yeah!

Messages.Name: hint_csc01_e05_sd
Messages.Text: $How big is this fire?

Messages.Name: hint_csc01_e05_bz
Messages.Text: $This whole area is destroyed.

Messages.Name: hint_csc01_e05_sv
Messages.Text: $Let's do this quickly!

Messages.Name: hint_csc01_e06_sn
Messages.Text: $The whole city's on fire.

Messages.Name: hint_csc01_e06_sd
Messages.Text: $What a pain...

Messages.Name: hint_csc01_e06_bz
Messages.Text: $This is nowhere near over!

Messages.Name: hint_csc01_e06_sv
Messages.Text: $How can I get him?

Messages.Name: hint_csc01_e07_bz
Messages.Text: $Is that all you've got!?

Messages.Name: hint_csc01_e07_sv
Messages.Text: $The building's knocked over!

Messages.Name: hint_csc01_e08_sv
Messages.Text: $That tornado!

Messages.Name: hint_flc01_a00_sn
Messages.Text: $Whoa, are you all coming out to say hi?

Messages.Name: hint_flc01_a00_sd
Messages.Text: $Heh, you can't stop me.

Messages.Name: hint_flc01_a00_sv
Messages.Text: $Get out of my way!

Messages.Name: hint_flc01_a01_sn
Messages.Text: $Whoa, that's not a nice welcome!

Messages.Name: hint_flc01_a01_sd
Messages.Text: $Get out of my way or you're toast!

Messages.Name: hint_flc01_a01_sv
Messages.Text:
$Heh, no matter how many of you come, 
it's a waste of time!

Messages.Name: hint_flc01_a02_sn
Messages.Text: $This bridge is going to collapse any minute...

Messages.Name: hint_flc01_a02_sd
Messages.Text: $I've got to hurry. The bridge won't hold...

Messages.Name: hint_flc01_a03_sn
Messages.Text: $Whoa, the flame died!

Messages.Name: hint_flc01_a03_sd
Messages.Text: $I guess this flame dies after a while.

Messages.Name: hint_flc01_a03_sv
Messages.Text: $Dang! Out of time.

Messages.Name: hint_flc01_a04_sn
Messages.Text: $Lava shoots up from that fiery ground...

Messages.Name: hint_flc01_a04_sd
Messages.Text: $Gotta watch out for the fiery areas.

Messages.Name: hint_flc01_a04_sv
Messages.Text:
$The ground here is unstable with lava... 
It's probably because of him!

Messages.Name: hint_flc01_a05_sv
Messages.Text:
$It seems like the attacks come in
regular intervals...

Messages.Name: hint_flc01_a06_sv
Messages.Text:
$I'll have to get closer 
and use my power directly!

Messages.Name: hint_flc01_e00_sn
Messages.Text: $Woo-hoo! What a view!

Messages.Name: hint_flc01_e00_sd
Messages.Text:
$The crust's energy is out of control... 
Is it because of the Chaos Emeralds?

Messages.Name: hint_flc01_e01_sn
Messages.Text: $Cool, it's raining fire!

Messages.Name: hint_flc01_e01_sd
Messages.Text: $It's erupting... let's go!

Messages.Name: hint_flc01_e01_sv
Messages.Text: $You're not going to get in my way, Iblis!

Messages.Name: hint_flc01_e02_sn
Messages.Text: $Let's head into the volcano!

Messages.Name: hint_flc01_e02_sd
Messages.Text: $That volcano... Let's go!

Messages.Name: hint_flc01_e02_sv
Messages.Text: $I'm coming, Iblis!

Messages.Name: hint_flc01_e03_sn
Messages.Text: $Whew! Out at last!

Messages.Name: hint_flc01_e03_sd
Messages.Text: $Hmph! That took up a lot of time.

Messages.Name: hint_flc01_e03_sv
Messages.Text: $Okay! Let's move on!

Messages.Name: hint_flc01_e04_sn
Messages.Text: $Thank you, Knuckles!

Messages.Name: hint_flc01_e04_sd
Messages.Text: $Rouge, you saved me!

Messages.Name: hint_flc01_e04_sv
Messages.Text:
$What is that ball of flame?
Is that the power of Iblis!?

Messages.Name: hint_flc01_e05_sv
Messages.Text: $Now, all I have to do is take him down!

Messages.Name: hint_flc01_h00_so
Messages.Text:
$Use the footing that comes floating along
with the lava flow.

Messages.Name: hint_flc01_h01_so
Messages.Text: $You can make a path with your power.

Messages.Name: hint_flc01_h02_so
Messages.Text:
$If you attack the light in the sky, 
it will show you the way.

Messages.Name: hint_flc01_h03_so
Messages.Text:
$Concentrate your power on the light 
and it will show you the way.

Messages.Name: hint_flc01_h04_so
Messages.Text:
$If all of the lights shine at once,
your way will become clear.

Messages.Name: hint_rct01_a00_sn
Messages.Text: $I've got to get ahead and help the train!

Messages.Name: hint_rct01_a00_sd
Messages.Text: $I've got to stop the Doctor's train.

Messages.Name: hint_rct01_a00_sv
Messages.Text: $I'm not going to let the "Iblis Trigger" get away!

Messages.Name: hint_rct01_a01_sn
Messages.Text:
$Elise's train is... 
Uh oh! Gotta speed up!

Messages.Name: hint_rct01_a01_sd
Messages.Text:
$I'll be able to catch up with the Doctor's train
ahead.

Messages.Name: hint_rct01_a02_sd
Messages.Text: $I'm sure there's a way to stop the train.

Messages.Name: hint_rct01_a03_sd
Messages.Text:
$I'm going to have to destroy 
the train so it doesn't get away!

Messages.Name: hint_rct01_a04_sv
Messages.Text:
$There's no other way ahead. I guess I've got
to break down the door.

Messages.Name: hint_rct01_a05_sv
Messages.Text:
$If I put weights on this scale, 
I'll be able to move forward.

Messages.Name: hint_rct01_a06_sn
Messages.Text: $I'd better hurry up and cross this scale.

Messages.Name: hint_rct01_a06_sd
Messages.Text:
$This scale is fragile.
I'd better just run across it.

Messages.Name: hint_rct01_a07_sn
Messages.Text: $Does this conveyor change direction?

Messages.Name: hint_rct01_a07_sd
Messages.Text: $This conveyor belt changes direction.

Messages.Name: hint_rct01_a07_sv
Messages.Text:
$This conveyor belt changes directions.
I'd better be careful...

Messages.Name: hint_rct01_a08_sn
Messages.Text:
$I'll be able to move faster if I go 
on top of the train instead of being on the rails.

Messages.Name: hint_rct01_a09_sv
Messages.Text: $I'll blow away these containers with my power!

Messages.Name: hint_rct01_a10_sn
Messages.Text: $That's the only place without any cargo!

Messages.Name: hint_rct01_a10_sd
Messages.Text: $I can jump over the area without any cargo.

Messages.Name: hint_rct01_a11_sd
Messages.Text:
$You think that those attacks
are going to keep me away?

Messages.Name: hint_rct01_a12_sd
Messages.Text:
$I'm going to have to use 
Homing Missiles so he doesn't get away.

Messages.Name: hint_rct01_e00_sn
Messages.Text: $I'd better hurry!

Messages.Name: hint_rct01_e00_sd
Messages.Text: $Oh no, I'd better speed up!

Messages.Name: hint_rct01_e01_sn
Messages.Text:
$Eggman! Grrr...
I'd better go help...!
Gotta hurry!

Messages.Name: hint_rct01_e01_hu
Messages.Text: $Sonic! Help!

Messages.Name: hint_rct01_e01_eg
Messages.Text:
$Sonic! Shouldn't you save the train
before chasing after me?

Messages.Name: hint_rct01_e02_sn
Messages.Text: $Is Elise on board?

Messages.Name: hint_rct01_e02_sd
Messages.Text: $Is that the Doctor's train?

Messages.Name: hint_rct01_e03_sd
Messages.Text:
$Doctor, stop!
It's time to give up!

Messages.Name: hint_rct01_e04_sn
Messages.Text:
$I'm almost there!
Elise... Hang on!

Messages.Name: hint_rct01_e05_eg
Messages.Text:
$You're just wasting your time!
You're never going to catch me!

Messages.Name: hint_rct01_e06_eg
Messages.Text:
$You're never going to catch me!
Farewell!

Messages.Name: hint_rct01_e07_eg
Messages.Text:
$Whoa!
The barrier is stopping me! 
Hurry up and take down the barrier!

Messages.Name: hint_rct01_e08_eg
Messages.Text: $The barrier is almost down!

Messages.Name: hint_rct01_e09_eg
Messages.Text: $The barrier's down! Farewell!

Messages.Name: hint_rct01_e10_eg
Messages.Text:
$What a hassle!
I'm going to take this barrier right down!

Messages.Name: hint_rct01_h00_so
Messages.Text:
$Just touching that switch won't do anything.
You need to apply force, and move the lever.

Messages.Name: hint_rct01_h01_so
Messages.Text:
$This scale tilts differently 
depending on the weight you put on it. 
Use this wisely to move forward.

Messages.Name: hint_rct01_h02_so
Messages.Text:
$If you fail at adjusting the scales, 
use the switch nearby.

Messages.Name: hint_aqa01_a00_sn
Messages.Text:
$If I get on this ball, 
I'll be able to get over there.

Messages.Name: hint_aqa01_a00_tl
Messages.Text:
$Sonic, this mysterious ball 
has a slight magnetic force.

Messages.Name: hint_aqa01_a01_tl
Messages.Text:
$If you use the power of this ball, 
you can get over there.

Messages.Name: hint_aqa01_a02_tl
Messages.Text: $Sonic, that magnet is really strong.

Messages.Name: hint_aqa01_a02_kn
Messages.Text:
$If you use that magnet,
you can change the route.

Messages.Name: hint_aqa01_a03_tl
Messages.Text:
$If you attack the switch,
the magnet will activate.

Messages.Name: hint_aqa01_a04_tl
Messages.Text:
$There are some magnets that repel
if you push them twice...

Messages.Name: hint_aqa01_a05_tl
Messages.Text:
$Look! There's the magnet switch. 
Push it, and the path should open!

Messages.Name: hint_aqa01_a06_tl
Messages.Text:
$Okay, that's the switch. 
Just wait, Sonic!

Messages.Name: hint_aqa01_a06_kn
Messages.Text: $Dang! Where's the switch to turn off the laser?

Messages.Name: hint_aqa01_a07_sn
Messages.Text: $If I slide, I can squeeze through.

Messages.Name: hint_aqa01_e00_tl
Messages.Text:
$This used to be a Soleanna laboratory.
It looks like it was really advanced.

Messages.Name: hint_aqa01_e00_kn
Messages.Text: $Who knew that Eggman's base would be here?

Messages.Name: hint_aqa01_e00_sd
Messages.Text: $It looks like their science was pretty advanced.

Messages.Name: hint_aqa01_e00_sv
Messages.Text: $Was this underwater?

Messages.Name: hint_aqa01_e01_kn
Messages.Text:
$Sonic, the security's tight. 
Be careful!

Messages.Name: hint_aqa01_e01_sv
Messages.Text: $A laboratory like this, under Soleanna...

Messages.Name: hint_aqa01_e02_sn
Messages.Text:
$The battleship will take off any minute.
Tails, Knuckles, let's hurry!

Messages.Name: hint_aqa01_e03_sn
Messages.Text:
$Thank you, Tails.
You were a big help.

Messages.Name: hint_aqa01_e03_tl
Messages.Text:
$Sonic, there must be a switch for the door. 
Leave it up to me.

Messages.Name: hint_aqa01_e03_kn
Messages.Text:
$Sonic, we're out of time.
Get on this ball.
I'll take care of the rest.

Messages.Name: hint_aqa01_e03_sd
Messages.Text: $You go, and leave the rest up to me.

Messages.Name: hint_aqa01_e03_sv
Messages.Text:
$There must be a switch for the door ahead.
Leave this up to me.

Messages.Name: hint_aqa01_e04_sn
Messages.Text:
$Dang it! When the door opens, 
it activates the robots. 
Tails, Knuckles, be careful.

Messages.Name: hint_aqa01_e04_sd
Messages.Text: $Silver, let's split up and chase our own target!

Messages.Name: hint_aqa01_e04_sv
Messages.Text: $Shadow, I'll be looking out for your "truth."

Messages.Name: hint_aqa01_e05_sn
Messages.Text:
$Knuckles, thanks!
All right, let's roll!

Messages.Name: hint_aqa01_e06_ec
Messages.Text:
$Unauthorized access in Area 1.
Eliminate immediately.

Messages.Name: hint_aqa01_e07_ec
Messages.Text:
$Intruder passing area 2.
Intruder passing area 2.

Messages.Name: hint_aqa01_e08_ec
Messages.Text:
$Intruder passing area 3.
Intruder passing area 3.

Messages.Name: hint_aqa01_e09_ec
Messages.Text: $Area shutdown system activated.

Messages.Name: hint_aqa00_e00_so
Messages.Text:
$This switch operates the magnetic force. 
Some only attract, while others repel. $Focus on the color after turning on the switch.

Messages.Name: hint_aqa00_e01_so
Messages.Text:
$You can get on this ball, and control it.
But it will disappear on impact,
so be careful.

Messages.Name: hint_end01_e00_tl
Messages.Text:
$Sonic... 
We have to find the Chaos Emeralds soon!

Messages.Name: hint_end01_e00_kn
Messages.Text: $The Chaos Emeralds... Where are they!?

Messages.Name: hint_end01_e00_sd
Messages.Text:
$The time-space rift is expanding... 
There's no more time, I need to hurry.

Messages.Name: hint_end01_e00_rg
Messages.Text: $The Chaos Emeralds... Where are they?

Messages.Name: hint_end01_e00_om
Messages.Text:
$Our targets are the Chaos Emeralds.
I will begin the search immediately.

Messages.Name: hint_end01_e00_am
Messages.Text: $Sonic! I'm going to save you!

Messages.Name: hint_end01_e00_sv
Messages.Text: $I'll never give up... Let's go!

Messages.Name: hint_end01_e01_tl
Messages.Text: $Sonic! I'm coming!

Messages.Name: hint_end01_e01_kn
Messages.Text: $Sonic! I'm coming!

Messages.Name: hint_end01_e01_sd
Messages.Text:
$Okay, this is it!
Sonic... Here I come.

Messages.Name: hint_end01_e01_rg
Messages.Text: $Sonic! I'm coming!

Messages.Name: hint_end01_e01_om
Messages.Text: $Returning immediately.

Messages.Name: hint_end01_e01_am
Messages.Text: $Sonic! I'm on my way!

Messages.Name: hint_end01_e01_sv
Messages.Text: $All right! Sonic, here I come!

Messages.Name: hint_end01_e02_tl
Messages.Text: $The Chaos Emeralds... Where are they?

Messages.Name: hint_end01_e02_kn
Messages.Text: $Shoot! This can't be happening...

Messages.Name: hint_end01_e02_sd
Messages.Text: $The Chaos Emeralds... Where are they!?

Messages.Name: hint_end01_e02_rg
Messages.Text: $This isn't good... We need to hurry.

Messages.Name: hint_end01_e02_am
Messages.Text: $Sonic...

Messages.Name: hint_end01_e02_sv
Messages.Text: $There's no more time, let's hurry!

Messages.Name: hint_end01_e03_tl
Messages.Text:
$Be careful! Make sure you don't get sucked
into the time-space rift!

Messages.Name: hint_end01_e03_kn
Messages.Text: $Be careful not to get sucked into the rift.

Messages.Name: hint_end01_e03_sd
Messages.Text: $I need to stay away from that.

Messages.Name: hint_end01_e03_rg
Messages.Text: $If you get sucked into the rift, it's over.

Messages.Name: hint_end01_e03_om
Messages.Text: $High-energy reading detected. Evading.

Messages.Name: hint_end01_e03_am
Messages.Text: $Oh no! I'm getting sucked in!

Messages.Name: hint_end01_e03_sv
Messages.Text: $Hmph! It's over if I get sucked into that.

Messages.Name: hint_end01_e04_tl
Messages.Text: $The time-space rift is really expanding...

Messages.Name: hint_end01_e04_kn
Messages.Text: $The time-space rift... Is it growing!?

Messages.Name: hint_end01_e04_sd
Messages.Text: $That rift... Is it expanding?

Messages.Name: hint_end01_e04_rg
Messages.Text: $What!? The rift, it's growing!

Messages.Name: hint_end01_e04_om
Messages.Text: $High-energy reading increasing.

Messages.Name: hint_end01_e04_am
Messages.Text:
$Oh, no!
That weird rift is growing!

Messages.Name: hint_end01_e04_sv
Messages.Text:
$The time-space rift is expanding.
We must hurry, or our time will disappear.

Messages.Name: hint_end01_e05_tl
Messages.Text:
$The rift is disappearing... 
All right, let's look for the Chaos Emeralds!

Messages.Name: hint_end01_e05_kn
Messages.Text: $All right! Now let's look for the Chaos Emeralds!

Messages.Name: hint_end01_e05_sd
Messages.Text: $All right! Let's hurry!

Messages.Name: hint_end01_e05_rg
Messages.Text:
$The time-space rift disappeared... 
We've got to collect the emeralds now.

Messages.Name: hint_end01_e05_om
Messages.Text: $High-energy reading decreasing.

Messages.Name: hint_end01_e05_am
Messages.Text:
$The rift is gone... 
We've got to hurry now!

Messages.Name: hint_end01_e05_sv
Messages.Text:
$The rift disappeared... 
Now, I have to hurry!

Messages.Name: hint_end01_h00_so
Messages.Text:
$If you touch this rock, 
you can slow the time-space rift
just slightly. $Use it wisely, and collect the
Chaos Emeralds before time-space
is destroyed.

Messages.Name: hint_bat01_e00_sn
Messages.Text: $I'll take all of you on!

Messages.Name: hint_bat01_e00_tl
Messages.Text: $I'm not gonna lose!

Messages.Name: hint_bat01_e00_kn
Messages.Text: $I won't hurt you too much.

Messages.Name: hint_bat01_e00_sd
Messages.Text: $Witness my power.

Messages.Name: hint_bat01_e00_rg
Messages.Text: $I'll show you what a real treasure hunter can do.

Messages.Name: hint_bat01_e00_om
Messages.Text: $Combat preparation complete.

Messages.Name: hint_bat01_e00_am
Messages.Text: $I'm going to win for sure!

Messages.Name: hint_bat01_e00_bz
Messages.Text: $I'm not going to go easy on you!

Messages.Name: hint_bat01_e00_sv
Messages.Text: $I can't lose.

Messages.Name: hint_bat01_e01_sn
Messages.Text: $Hey guys, maybe we'll do this again.

Messages.Name: hint_bat01_e01_tl
Messages.Text: $Hehehe. Yeah!

Messages.Name: hint_bat01_e01_kn
Messages.Text: $Now you know my strength.

Messages.Name: hint_bat01_e01_sd
Messages.Text: $Whatever you try, it's useless!

Messages.Name: hint_bat01_e01_rg
Messages.Text: $You underestimated me.

Messages.Name: hint_bat01_e01_om
Messages.Text: $Mission complete.

Messages.Name: hint_bat01_e01_am
Messages.Text: $Yeah!

Messages.Name: hint_bat01_e01_bz
Messages.Text: $That was a fierce battle.

Messages.Name: hint_bat01_e01_sv
Messages.Text: $I told you I couldn't lose.

Messages.Name: hint_bat01_e02_sn
Messages.Text: $YES!

Messages.Name: hint_bat01_e02_tl
Messages.Text: $Yeah!

Messages.Name: hint_bat01_e02_kn
Messages.Text: $All right!

Messages.Name: hint_bat01_e02_sd
Messages.Text: $Hmm!

Messages.Name: hint_bat01_e02_rg
Messages.Text: $Ha!

Messages.Name: hint_bat01_e02_om
Messages.Text: $Task completed.

Messages.Name: hint_bat01_e02_am
Messages.Text: $Good job!

Messages.Name: hint_bat01_e02_bz
Messages.Text: $All right!

Messages.Name: hint_bat01_e02_sv
Messages.Text: $All right!

Messages.Name: hint_bat01_h00_so
Messages.Text: $Ready, go!

Messages.Name: hint_bat01_h01_so
Messages.Text: $Congratulations.

Messages.Name: hint_bat01_h02_so
Messages.Text: $Finished.

Messages.Name: hint_bos01_a00_bz
Messages.Text:
$His weak spot is the armored head.
Aim for that, Silver!

Messages.Name: hint_bos01_a01_bz
Messages.Text:
$Grab his lava projectiles with your Psychokinesis
and send his attack right back at him!

Messages.Name: hint_bos01_a02_bz
Messages.Text:
$It's dangerous to be in front of him when he's
getting ready to attack. But using my flame
ability will allow you to take a frontal approach.

Messages.Name: hint_bos01_a06_bz
Messages.Text: $Haaaaaa!

Messages.Name: hint_bos01_a07_bz
Messages.Text: $My flame can penetrate anything!

Messages.Name: hint_bos01_a08_bz
Messages.Text:
$Use the debris from the thrown buildings to
attack him!

Messages.Name: hint_bos01_e00_sv
Messages.Text:
$Iblis!
Today... It will be finished!

Messages.Name: hint_bos01_e01_sv
Messages.Text:
$Is it over? $It's not over yet!
Don't let your guard down, Silver!

Messages.Name: hint_bos02_a00_sn
Messages.Text:
$It's a little too far to attack.
Is there some way to draw him in?

Messages.Name: hint_bos02_a00_sd
Messages.Text:
$I can't do anything from here.
I need to find some way to draw him in...

Messages.Name: hint_bos02_a01_sn
Messages.Text:
$Shadow! There are hard footholds that his
attacks can't break. Use those to counterattack!

Messages.Name: hint_bos02_a01_sd
Messages.Text:
$It looks like there are hard footholds that his
attacks can't break. Take advantage of them to 
evade and counterattack.

Messages.Name: hint_bos02_a02_sn
Messages.Text:
$I've got to light the orb above the rocks. Then I
need to get his attention and draw him toward it!

Messages.Name: hint_bos02_a02_sd
Messages.Text:
$The orb above the rocks... I can light it to get
his attention to lead him toward it!

Messages.Name: hint_bos02_a03_tl
Messages.Text:
$Watch out, Sonic!
Against something that large, you won't have
a chance on the soft footholds!

Messages.Name: hint_bos02_a03_rg
Messages.Text:
$Watch out, Shadow!
If something that big runs into you,
the soft footholds won't hold!

Messages.Name: hint_bos02_a04_tl
Messages.Text: $Sonic! It's coming!

Messages.Name: hint_bos02_a04_rg
Messages.Text: $Shadow! It's coming!

Messages.Name: hint_bos02_a05_kn
Messages.Text:
$It's dazed from the impacts!
Now's your chance, Sonic!

Messages.Name: hint_bos02_a05_rg
Messages.Text:
$He's dazed!
Now, Shadow, now!

Messages.Name: hint_bos02_e00_sn
Messages.Text: $Leave this to me!

Messages.Name: hint_bos02_e00_sd
Messages.Text: $I'll take care of this guy.

Messages.Name: hint_bos02_e01_sn
Messages.Text:
$Hey, what's wrong?
Is that size just for show?

Messages.Name: hint_bos02_e01_sd
Messages.Text: $Heh, you're not as tough as you look.

Messages.Name: hint_bos03_a00_bz
Messages.Text:
$It looks like he's getting closer to his final form. $You'll be in trouble if you let him get close.
Try to keep him away from here.

Messages.Name: hint_bos03_a02_bz
Messages.Text:
$I'll go all-out, too.
Use my flames as much as you want.

Messages.Name: hint_bos03_a07_bz
Messages.Text:
$That huge ball of flame is a dangerous attack
that can destroy footholds. $You have to use my power to stop it before
it's fired, or use your power to grab it.

Messages.Name: hint_bos03_a08_bz
Messages.Text:
$He sends out waves of flames one after the
other. You need to predict the next wave,
and evade it.

Messages.Name: hint_bos03_a09_bz
Messages.Text:
$Ngh... He's trying to destroy this foothold!
Silver! Don't let him get you, too!

Messages.Name: hint_bos03_a10_bz
Messages.Text:
$He's going to try to destroy the foothold from
a distance this time!
Here it comes, Silver!

Messages.Name: hint_bos03_e00_sv
Messages.Text:
$Here I come, Iblis!
This will be your end!

Messages.Name: hint_bos03_e01_bz
Messages.Text:
$He's reeling!
Now's your chance!

Messages.Name: hint_bos03_e02_bz
Messages.Text: $Now, Silver!

Messages.Name: hint_bos03_e03_sv
Messages.Text:
$Blaze!
Let's finish this!

Messages.Name: hint_bos03_e04_sv
Messages.Text:
$Just a little more... 
I will end this now!

Messages.Name: hint_bos04_a00_sd
Messages.Text:
$These shadows that he's controlling... 
I've got to figure out their origin!

Messages.Name: hint_bos04_a02_sd
Messages.Text:
$Now that he's materialized, he's faster.
But my Chaos Spear should be able to stop him.
Light against darkness...

Messages.Name: hint_bos04_a07_sd
Messages.Text:
$Mephiles will warp to break your lock-on. $Wait until he's about to fire his
huge energy attack. $That will give you the opening you need
to fire your Lock-on shot.

Messages.Name: hint_bos04_e00_sd
Messages.Text:
$Don't bother to try and deceive me.
I know who I am!

Messages.Name: hint_bos04_e00_om
Messages.Text:
$Shadow.
Rouge asked me to support you.

Messages.Name: hint_bos04_e01_mf
Messages.Text:
$Such foolishness... 
Very well, let's see if you can entertain me.

Messages.Name: hint_bos04_e02_mf
Messages.Text:
$It doesn't matter how many of them you
defeat, you know.

Messages.Name: hint_bos04_e03_mf
Messages.Text:
$I'm your shadow... 
You can't even touch me.

Messages.Name: hint_bos04_e04_mf
Messages.Text: $Looking for me?

Messages.Name: hint_bos04_e05_mf
Messages.Text: $Ha ha ha ha ha!

Messages.Name: hint_bos04_e06_mf
Messages.Text:
$What!?
Shadow! You...!

Messages.Name: hint_bos04_e07_mf
Messages.Text:
$You're just a nuisance...
Robot!

Messages.Name: hint_bos04_e08_mf
Messages.Text: $Dance, my shadows, dance!

Messages.Name: hint_bos04_e09_mf
Messages.Text: $Dance, dance!

Messages.Name: hint_bos04_e10_mf
Messages.Text: $Take this!

Messages.Name: hint_bos04_e11_mf
Messages.Text: $Gah!

Messages.Name: hint_bos04_e12_mf
Messages.Text: $You...

Messages.Name: hint_bos04_e13_mf
Messages.Text: $Gwaaaaah!

Messages.Name: hint_bos05_a00_rg
Messages.Text:
$These shadows are such a pain!
You need to do something!
Otherwise he can do whatever he wants! $You should be able to get rid of these
shadows with your Chaos Boost.

Messages.Name: hint_bos05_a01_rg
Messages.Text:
$You'll have to defeat that big one
if you want to build up your Chaos Gauge. $I bet his weak point is that eye.
Watch it carefully, and when it opens,
attack it! $Direct counterattacks are too risky.
Use your Chaos Spear to create an opening.

Messages.Name: hint_bos05_e00_sd
Messages.Text:
$Mephiles!
I won't let you escape!

Messages.Name: hint_bos05_e02_rg
Messages.Text:
$Hey, hey, hey... 
That doesn't look good! $Scan indicates that entity consists of numerous
shadows. Still, I believe it can be destroyed!

Messages.Name: hint_bos05_e03_mf
Messages.Text:
$I'll make sure you regret this,
Shadow The Hedgehog!

Messages.Name: hint_bos05_e04_mf
Messages.Text:
$Hmph. It seems
I underestimated you...

Messages.Name: hint_bos05_e05_mf
Messages.Text:
$You pests!
I'll crush you!

Messages.Name: hint_bos05_e06_mf
Messages.Text: $Drown in darkness!

Messages.Name: hint_bos05_e07_mf
Messages.Text: $Sink into darkness!

Messages.Name: hint_bos05_e08_mf
Messages.Text:
$I am forever... 
I am invincible...

Messages.Name: hint_bos06_a00_sn
Messages.Text:
$I get it, that armor on his head
is protecting the weak point. $The front's too dangerous, Sonic!
Circle around toward the tail!

Messages.Name: hint_bos06_a00_sd
Messages.Text:
$I see... That armor on his head
is protecting his weak point. $The front's too dangerous, Shadow!
Can you get around to the back?

Messages.Name: hint_bos06_a02_tl
Messages.Text:
$He receives his orders from Eggman
via the antenna on his back. $You can get on the tail when it comes down,
and then reach that antenna. $Grab the antenna using a Homing Attack!
Then you should be able to control him!

Messages.Name: hint_bos06_a02_rg
Messages.Text:
$It looks like he's getting his orders from Eggman
through the antenna on his back. $Get on the tail when it comes down
to reach that antenna. $Grab the antenna with a Homing Attack.
Then you should be able to control him!

Messages.Name: hint_bos06_a04_tl
Messages.Text:
$Once you grab the antenna, you should be able
to control him, Sonic! Slam him into a wall!

Messages.Name: hint_bos06_a04_rg
Messages.Text:
$Once you grab the antenna, you should be able
to control him! Slam him into a wall!

Messages.Name: hint_bos06_a05_tl
Messages.Text:
$Sonic!
Make him run into something!

Messages.Name: hint_bos06_a05_rg
Messages.Text:
$Shadow!
Make him crash into something!

Messages.Name: hint_bos06_e00_sn
Messages.Text:
$This is your pet, huh?
Okay, Eggman, I'll play with him.

Messages.Name: hint_bos06_e00_sd
Messages.Text:
$The Doctor's guard dog... 
Still, I need to get through here.

Messages.Name: hint_bos06_e00_eg
Messages.Text:
$I'll take care of you now!
An early breakfast for my pet!

Messages.Name: hint_bos06_e01_sn
Messages.Text:
$Hey, I can finally see your face!
Now it's my turn!

Messages.Name: hint_bos06_e01_sd
Messages.Text:
$Looks like that armor's gone.
Now it's my turn!

Messages.Name: hint_bos06_e03_eg
Messages.Text:
$Whaaa!?
I've lost control!

Messages.Name: hint_bos06_e02_eg
Messages.Text:
$Sonic!
I won't let you get away!

Messages.Name: hint_bos06_e04_sn
Messages.Text:
$Hmph!
Listen to me!

Messages.Name: hint_bos06_e04_sd
Messages.Text:
$Ngh... 
Do what I tell you!

Messages.Name: hint_bos07_a00_sn
Messages.Text:
$If I stay on the ground, I'll be vulnerable.
To bring that big thing down, I'll have to
get to it somehow. $I might be able to reach the wings
if I do Homing Attacks on those robots
he's sending out.
