Messages.Name: hint_bos07_a00_bz
Messages.Text:
$His armor looks thick, but you might be able
to destroy those glowing parts.

Messages.Name: hint_bos07_a01_bz
Messages.Text:
$It looks like the central core is protected
by a barrier. Let's start by destroying the
things around it.

Messages.Name: hint_bos07_a02_sn
Messages.Text:
$It looks like bound jumps from overhead
should be effective...  $But if I stay too long, I'll be vulnerable. I've got
to get back to the ground if I run out of rings.

Messages.Name: hint_bos07_a02_bz
Messages.Text:
$The hatches on the wings open to let robots
out. That's your chance to attack! $With your power, you should be able to use
his missiles and those robots as your
ammunition.

Messages.Name: hint_bos07_a04_bz
Messages.Text:
$The barrier's down!
Take out the central control core!

Messages.Name: hint_bos07_a05_bz
Messages.Text:
$They're locked on to you!
Shake'em off!

Messages.Name: hint_bos07_a05_pr
Messages.Text: $Sonic, run!

Messages.Name: hint_bos07_a06_bz
Messages.Text:
$Silver, watch it!
He's coming in!

Messages.Name: hint_bos07_a06_pr
Messages.Text:
$Sonic, look out!
The fortress is crashing!

Messages.Name: hint_bos07_e00_sn
Messages.Text:
$You think you can intimidate me with
just your size?  Come on, let's see
what you can do!

Messages.Name: hint_bos07_e00_sv
Messages.Text:
$A guard, huh?
Just try and stop me!

Messages.Name: hint_bos07_e00_eg
Messages.Text:
$Persistent little hedgehog... 
Let's see what you can do against this firepower!

Messages.Name: hint_bos07_e01_pr
Messages.Text: $Sonic!

Messages.Name: hint_bos07_e02_pr
Messages.Text: $Watch out!

Messages.Name: hint_bos07_e03_sn
Messages.Text: $All right, you're going down!

Messages.Name: hint_bos07_e03_sv
Messages.Text: $Let's finish this!

Messages.Name: hint_bos07_e04_eg
Messages.Text:
$Why you little... 
Upper cannons open fire! Shoot him down!

Messages.Name: hint_bos07_e05_eg
Messages.Text:
$Begin charging core laser!
Take this, Sonic!

Messages.Name: hint_bos07_e06_sn
Messages.Text: $All right, you're going down!

Messages.Name: hint_bos07_e06_sv
Messages.Text: $Time to destroy the rest!

Messages.Name: hint_bos07_e07_eg
Messages.Text:
$Grr... My aerial fortress!
Reinforcements! Where are my reinforcements!?

Messages.Name: hint_bos08_a00_sn
Messages.Text:
$It looks like Eggman's cockpit
is located inside the mouth. $He flying really fast. I don't think I can
just hope to hit him by randomly attacking. $I've got to evade it when it glides, and grab that
horn. If I can control it and run into the mechs
around it, I should be able to break that canopy.

Messages.Name: hint_bos08_a03_sn
Messages.Text:
$Those robots coming from the cockpit... 
If I use them, I can reach Eggman!

Messages.Name: hint_bos08_a04_pr
Messages.Text:
$Sonic! Get away from the target!
He's going to take out the entire foothold!

Messages.Name: hint_bos08_a05_sn
Messages.Text:
$Hmm... As long as that canopy is protecting the
cockpit, it'll be hard to attack Eggman directly...

Messages.Name: hint_bos08_a06_pr
Messages.Text:
$Sonic! That horn on his head... 
Doesn't it look like the antenna on the robot
that attacked us in the desert?

Messages.Name: hint_bos08_a07_pr
Messages.Text:
$Sonic! Watch out!
He's still trying something!

Messages.Name: hint_bos08_e00_sn
Messages.Text:
$Right back at ya!
I'll finish this here!

Messages.Name: hint_bos08_e00_eg
Messages.Text:
$You keep getting in my way, you pesky little
hedgehog...  $Very well! I'll take you out
myself!

Messages.Name: hint_bos08_e01_pr
Messages.Text: $Nooo!

Messages.Name: hint_bos08_e02_eg
Messages.Text: $Take this!

Messages.Name: hint_bos08_e03_eg
Messages.Text: $Can you avoid this, Sonic?

Messages.Name: hint_bos08_e04_eg
Messages.Text: $Here I come, Sonic!

Messages.Name: hint_bos08_e05_eg
Messages.Text: $Do it!

Messages.Name: hint_bos08_e06_eg
Messages.Text: $Fall!

Messages.Name: hint_bos08_e07_eg
Messages.Text: $What's wrong, Sonic?

Messages.Name: hint_bos08_e08_eg
Messages.Text: $Can you make it here!?

Messages.Name: hint_bos08_e09_eg
Messages.Text: $Wah ha ha ha ha ha!

Messages.Name: hint_bos08_e10_eg
Messages.Text: $Ngh!

Messages.Name: hint_bos08_e11_eg
Messages.Text: $Grr... You little...

Messages.Name: hint_bos08_e12_eg
Messages.Text: $This is nothing!

Messages.Name: hint_bos08_e17_eg
Messages.Text:
$No!
The canopy! $Hey Eggman,
what's the matter? $You... 
I'm just getting started!

Messages.Name: hint_bos08_e14_sn
Messages.Text:
$This is it, Eggman!
Prepare for another defeat! $Grrr!
I won't go down like this!

Messages.Name: hint_bos08_e16_eg
Messages.Text:
$I can't believe this!
Grrrraaaaah!

Messages.Name: hint_bos09_a00_sn
Messages.Text:
$If I just attack from the front, I'll get caught
by that strange power. I've got to find an
opening.

Messages.Name: hint_bos09_a00_sv
Messages.Text:
$Normal attacks won't work while he's in midair...
I've got to find an opening somewhere else.

Messages.Name: hint_bos09_a01_sn
Messages.Text:
$I can't let that strange power hit me...
I've got to use Homing Attacks on the
things he throws to close in on him.

Messages.Name: hint_bos09_a01_sv
Messages.Text:
$His movements are just too fast. But if I can
figure out the direction he's planning to 
charge in, I can block it with my Psychokinesis.

Messages.Name: hint_bos09_a02_sn
Messages.Text:
$The attacks from the ground are a pain to
avoid, but if I can evade in midair, I might
find an opening to attack.

Messages.Name: hint_bos09_a02_sv
Messages.Text:
$When he staggers, that's my chance.
If I can get close, I should be able
to grab him with my power.

Messages.Name: hint_bos09_e00_sn
Messages.Text:
$Doesn't look like
you're here to talk...

Messages.Name: hint_bos09_e00_sv
Messages.Text:
$Time for you to disappear,
Iblis Trigger!

Messages.Name: hint_bos09_e01_sn
Messages.Text: $Here I come!

Messages.Name: hint_bos09_e01_sv
Messages.Text: $Take this!

Messages.Name: hint_bos09_e02_sn
Messages.Text: $Now I'm serious!

Messages.Name: hint_bos09_e02_sv
Messages.Text: $How about this!

Messages.Name: hint_bos09_e03_sn
Messages.Text: $Gotcha!

Messages.Name: hint_bos09_e03_sv
Messages.Text: $It's no use!

Messages.Name: hint_bos09_e04_sn
Messages.Text: $Ugh... That hurt...

Messages.Name: hint_bos09_e05_sn
Messages.Text: $What!?

Messages.Name: hint_bos09_e05_sv
Messages.Text: $Dang!

Messages.Name: hint_bos09_e06_sn
Messages.Text:
$Guh... 
Not bad!

Messages.Name: hint_bos09_e06_sv
Messages.Text:
$Ngh... It's not over yet!
I will defeat you!

Messages.Name: hint_bos09_e07_sn
Messages.Text: $You... Who are you?

Messages.Name: hint_bos09_e07_sv
Messages.Text: $I can't lose to you...

Messages.Name: hint_bos09_e08_sn
Messages.Text:
$All right! I don't know who you are,
but you're no match for me!

Messages.Name: hint_bos09_e08_sv
Messages.Text:
$Iblis Trigger... 
Is that all you've got?

Messages.Name: hint_bos10_a00_sd
Messages.Text:
$Attacking from the front leaves me vulnerable
to that strange power. I need to find an
opening.

Messages.Name: hint_bos10_a00_sv
Messages.Text:
$Those arrows of light... I need to watch out
for them. They seem to stop my movement.

Messages.Name: hint_bos10_a01_sd
Messages.Text:
$That strange power... 
I might be able to stop it
with my Chaos Spear.

Messages.Name: hint_bos10_a01_sv
Messages.Text:
$Right before he shoots his arrows of light,
he leaves himself vulnerable in midair.
If I can attack him then...

Messages.Name: hint_bos10_a02_sd
Messages.Text:
$If I can hit him with a Chaos Spear when he
lifts up a train, I should be able to create
an opening.

Messages.Name: hint_bos10_e00_sd
Messages.Text: $I won't hold back... Here I come!

Messages.Name: hint_bos10_e00_sv
Messages.Text: $Don't get in my way!

Messages.Name: hint_bos10_e01_sd
Messages.Text: $Haaaaa!

Messages.Name: hint_bos10_e02_sd
Messages.Text: $There!

Messages.Name: hint_bos10_e03_sd
Messages.Text: $Witness the might of my power!

Messages.Name: hint_bos10_e04_sv
Messages.Text: $This will end it!

Messages.Name: hint_bos10_e05_sd
Messages.Text: $Ngh...

Messages.Name: hint_bos10_e05_sv
Messages.Text: $Gwah!

Messages.Name: hint_bos10_e06_sd
Messages.Text: $Now you're asking for it...

Messages.Name: hint_bos10_e06_sv
Messages.Text:
$Why!?
Why are you getting in my way!?

Messages.Name: hint_bos10_e07_sd
Messages.Text: $Ugh... My body...

Messages.Name: hint_bos10_e08_sd
Messages.Text:
$I can't believe it... 
How can it be...

Messages.Name: hint_bos10_e08_sv
Messages.Text:
$Grr!
I can't lose here!

Messages.Name: hint_bos10_e09_sd
Messages.Text: $You're still no match for me!

Messages.Name: hint_bos10_e09_sv
Messages.Text:
$Sorry, but I can't afford
to stop here.

Messages.Name: hint_bos11_e00_eg
Messages.Text:
$That body of light is the sign of a super-
dimensional life form. Standard attacks won't
work on him! He eats dimensions for lunch!

Messages.Name: hint_bos11_e01_eg
Messages.Text:
$But... There should be something that's
anchoring him in this dimension. $That's probably the light shells that
can be seen on his body. $If all of those are destroyed,
he can be defeated!

Messages.Name: hint_bos11_a06_pr
Messages.Text:
$Sonic, draw the blue light into your body!
The light will turn your body into
an arrow of light!

Messages.Name: hint_bos11_a07_om
Messages.Text:
$Shadow, strike him with your Spear of Light.
If you charge the red light,
you can launch an even stronger attack.

Messages.Name: hint_bos11_a07_am
Messages.Text:
$Silver, your power can become a Shield of Light!
If you trap your opponent in the green light,
you can attack him directly!

Messages.Name: hint_bos11_a08_eg
Messages.Text:
$That's a dimensional hole!
Can he summon things from other dimensions
into this warped space!?

Messages.Name: hint_bos11_a09_kn
Messages.Text:
$No problem, Sonic!
Just blow 'em away before they come out!

Messages.Name: hint_bos11_a10_om
Messages.Text:
$If you use your Spear of Light, you should
be able to destroy the material and close the
dimensional hole.

Messages.Name: hint_bos11_a11_am
Messages.Text:
$Your Shield of Light should be able to stop
whatever comes out of that hole!
Then you can throw it back at him!

Messages.Name: hint_bos11_a12_eg
Messages.Text:
$No! Now he's trying to suck you into 
another dimension! If you don't want to
take an unplanned trip, evade! Evade!

Messages.Name: hint_bos11_a13_kn
Messages.Text:
$When he spreads out both hands, he'll attack
from the right and the left. $If you evade up or down, you can attack
him directly!

Messages.Name: hint_bos11_a14_tl
Messages.Text:
$No...! $Ngh... Is it impossible to defeat a
super-dimensional being after all? $No... Something's different... 
I can feel a large, powerful consciousness
coming from Solaris!

Messages.Name: hint_bos11_a17_eg
Messages.Text:
$What? A consciousness!?
Hmm... That's it!
That's his core! $Even if we can't stop his form,
we can stop his consciousness! $Look!
There's a strange thing in the middle of Solaris!
Isn't that the core?

Messages.Name: hint_bos11_a24_tl
Messages.Text:
$No...! $Ngh... Is it impossible to defeat a
super-dimensional being after all? $No... Something's different... 
I can feel a large, powerful consciousness
coming from Solaris! $What? A consciousness!?
Hmm... That's it!
That's his core! $Even if we can't stop his form,
we can stop his consciousness! $Look!
There's a strange thing in the middle of Solaris!
Isn't that the core?

Messages.Name: hint_bos11_a22_om
Messages.Text:
$If he detects an attack on the core,
he will put up a field with the Wings of Light.
Find the right timing to attack the core! $The moment he attacks is your chance!
Solaris' core will be vulnerable.
Evade his attack, then strike at the same time!

Messages.Name: hint_bos11_e00_kn
Messages.Text:
$Don't hold back,
let him have it, Silver!

Messages.Name: hint_bos11_e01_rg
Messages.Text:
$You can do it,
Shadow!

Messages.Name: hint_bos11_e02_am
Messages.Text:
$Don't let him beat you,
Sonic!

Messages.Name: hint_bos11_e03_am
Messages.Text:
$Silver, please!
Protect everyone's future!

Messages.Name: hint_bos11_e04_pr
Messages.Text:
$Sonic... 
I believe in you...!

Messages.Name: hint_bos11_e05_eg
Messages.Text:
$Shadow!
I'm trusting you to do this!

Messages.Name: hint_bos11_e06_sn
Messages.Text: $I guess it's not going to be that easy.

Messages.Name: hint_bos11_e06_sd
Messages.Text:
$No... 
It's not over yet.

Messages.Name: hint_bos11_e06_sv
Messages.Text: $Is it over!?

Messages.Name: hint_bos11_e08_sn
Messages.Text:
$It's all you,
Shadow!

Messages.Name: hint_bos11_e08_sd
Messages.Text:
$Silver!
It's your turn.

Messages.Name: hint_bos11_e08_sv
Messages.Text:
$Good luck,
Sonic!

Messages.Name: hint_bos11_e09_sn
Messages.Text: $OK!

Messages.Name: hint_bos11_e09_sd
Messages.Text: $Understood.

Messages.Name: hint_bos11_e09_sv
Messages.Text: $I'll take care of this!

Messages.Name: hint_bos11_e10_sn
Messages.Text:
$The present-day...
The here and now that you've stolen... 
Time to take it back!

Messages.Name: hint_bos11_e10_sd
Messages.Text:
$I'll release you from the
chains of your past.

Messages.Name: hint_bos11_e10_sv
Messages.Text:
$I will protect
the future!

Messages.Name: hint_bos11_e11_sn
Messages.Text:
$Let's see how long you can keep up
that big attitude!

Messages.Name: hint_bos11_e11_sd
Messages.Text:
$A super-dimensional being... Heh.
This might even be a fair fight!

Messages.Name: hint_bos11_e11_sv
Messages.Text:
$The root of all of our problems... 
I will defeat you, Solaris!

Messages.Name: hint_bos11_e12_sn
Messages.Text:
$All right, it's my turn!
Let's have some fun, Solaris!

Messages.Name: hint_bos11_e12_sd
Messages.Text:
$Time to unleash
the ultimate power!

Messages.Name: hint_bos11_e12_sv
Messages.Text:
$This is the end!
Prepare to meet your doom!

Messages.Name: hint_twn01_a00_sn
Messages.Text: $Maybe I'll go to the Castle Town.

Messages.Name: hint_twn01_a00_tl
Messages.Text: $Let's go to the Castle Town!

Messages.Name: hint_twn01_a00_kn
Messages.Text: $Let's go to the Castle Town!

Messages.Name: hint_twn01_a00_sd
Messages.Text: $Maybe I'll go to the Castle Town...

Messages.Name: hint_twn01_a00_rg
Messages.Text: $Do you want to go to the Castle Town?

Messages.Name: hint_twn01_a00_om
Messages.Text: $Let's go to the Castle Town.

Messages.Name: hint_twn01_a00_am
Messages.Text: $Do you want to go to the Castle Town?

Messages.Name: hint_twn01_a00_bz
Messages.Text: $Let's go to the Castle Town.

Messages.Name: hint_twn01_a00_sv
Messages.Text: $Maybe I'll go to the Castle Town.

Messages.Name: hint_twn01_a01_sn
Messages.Text: $Maybe I'll go to the forest.

Messages.Name: hint_twn01_a01_tl
Messages.Text: $Let's go to the forest!

Messages.Name: hint_twn01_a01_kn
Messages.Text: $Let's go to the forest!

Messages.Name: hint_twn01_a01_sd
Messages.Text: $Maybe I'll go to the forest...

Messages.Name: hint_twn01_a01_rg
Messages.Text: $Do you want to go to the forest?

Messages.Name: hint_twn01_a01_om
Messages.Text: $Let's go to the forest.

Messages.Name: hint_twn01_a01_am
Messages.Text: $Do you want to go to the forest?

Messages.Name: hint_twn01_a01_bz
Messages.Text: $Let's go to the forest.

Messages.Name: hint_twn01_a01_sv
Messages.Text: $Maybe I'll go to the forest.

Messages.Name: hint_twn01_a02_sn
Messages.Text: $I'll head to the New City!

Messages.Name: hint_twn01_a02_tl
Messages.Text: $Do you want to head to the New City?

Messages.Name: hint_twn01_a02_kn
Messages.Text: $Let's go to the New City.

Messages.Name: hint_twn01_a02_sd
Messages.Text: $Maybe I'll head over to the New City...

Messages.Name: hint_twn01_a02_rg
Messages.Text: $Do you want to go to the New City?

Messages.Name: hint_twn01_a02_om
Messages.Text: $Let's go to the New City.

Messages.Name: hint_twn01_a02_am
Messages.Text: $Do you want to go to the New City?

Messages.Name: hint_twn01_a02_bz
Messages.Text: $Let's head to the New City.

Messages.Name: hint_twn01_a02_sv
Messages.Text: $Maybe I'll go to the New City.

Messages.Name: hint_twn01_a03_sn
Messages.Text: $I don't think I should go there yet...

Messages.Name: hint_twn01_a03_tl
Messages.Text: $Shouldn't ya stay here for a while?

Messages.Name: hint_twn01_a03_kn
Messages.Text: $You still have unfinished business!

Messages.Name: hint_twn01_a03_sd
Messages.Text: $I shouldn't go there just yet.

Messages.Name: hint_twn01_a03_rg
Messages.Text: $Shouldn't you stay here for a while?

Messages.Name: hint_twn01_a03_om
Messages.Text: $No target readings from that area.

Messages.Name: hint_twn01_a03_am
Messages.Text: $I don't think you should go over there yet...

Messages.Name: hint_twn01_a03_bz
Messages.Text: $It's too early to go over there.

Messages.Name: hint_twn01_a03_sv
Messages.Text: $I shouldn't go over there just yet.

Messages.Name: hint_twn01_a04_sn
Messages.Text: $Maybe I'll talk to some people in the town...

Messages.Name: hint_twn01_a04_tl
Messages.Text: $Let's talk to the people in the town!

Messages.Name: hint_twn01_a04_kn
Messages.Text: $Let's talk to some people in the town!

Messages.Name: hint_twn01_a04_sd
Messages.Text: $Maybe I'll talk to some people in the town...

Messages.Name: hint_twn01_a04_rg
Messages.Text: $Let's talk to some people in the town!

Messages.Name: hint_twn01_a04_om
Messages.Text: $Get information from the people in the town!

Messages.Name: hint_twn01_a04_am
Messages.Text: $Do you want to talk to the people in the town?

Messages.Name: hint_twn01_a04_bz
Messages.Text: $Let's talk to some people in the town!

Messages.Name: hint_twn01_a04_sv
Messages.Text: $Maybe I'll talk to some people in the town...

Messages.Name: hint_twn01_a05_sn
Messages.Text: $Maybe I'll go to the store...

Messages.Name: hint_twn01_a05_tl
Messages.Text: $Do you want to go to the store?

Messages.Name: hint_twn01_a05_kn
Messages.Text: $Let's go to the store!

Messages.Name: hint_twn01_a05_sd
Messages.Text: $Maybe I'll go to the store...

Messages.Name: hint_twn01_a05_rg
Messages.Text: $Let's go to the store!

Messages.Name: hint_twn01_a05_om
Messages.Text: $Go to the store!

Messages.Name: hint_twn01_a05_am
Messages.Text: $Do you want to go to the store?

Messages.Name: hint_twn01_a05_bz
Messages.Text: $Let's go to the store!

Messages.Name: hint_twn01_a05_sv
Messages.Text: $Maybe I'll go to the store...

Messages.Name: hint_twn01_a06_sn
Messages.Text: $I think I should look around here some more.

Messages.Name: hint_twn01_a06_tl
Messages.Text: $Shouldn't you investigate some more around here?

Messages.Name: hint_twn01_a06_kn
Messages.Text: $Shouldn't you investigate some more around here?

Messages.Name: hint_twn01_a06_sd
Messages.Text: $There might be more information around here.

Messages.Name: hint_twn01_a06_rg
Messages.Text: $Isn't there more you need to find out here?

Messages.Name: hint_twn01_a06_om
Messages.Text: $Collect information in this area.

Messages.Name: hint_twn01_a06_am
Messages.Text: $Do you wanna look around some more?

Messages.Name: hint_twn01_a06_bz
Messages.Text: $Do you want to investigate more around here?

Messages.Name: hint_twn01_a06_sv
Messages.Text: $I think there's something important around here.

Messages.Name: hint_twn01_e00_sn
Messages.Text:
$What's Eggman up to...?
I need to gather some information

Messages.Name: hint_twn01_e00_tl
Messages.Text:
$Sonic!
There's a nice store in this town.  It 
might help you find a way to cross the sea.

Messages.Name: hint_twn01_e02_tl
Messages.Text:
$If you can squeeze through this gap,
you'll be able to save the girl!

Messages.Name: hint_twn01_e03_sn
Messages.Text:
$It's getting pretty late.
We should be getting back.
I'll take you to the castle.

Messages.Name: hint_twn01_e04_tl
Messages.Text:
$Sonic, can you hear me?
Knuckles wants to see you.
Head to the town's warehouse!

Messages.Name: hint_twn01_e05_tl
Messages.Text: $Sonic, let's hurry and find the princess!

Messages.Name: hint_twn01_e05_kn
Messages.Text:
$Heh, there's a secret room here!
Let's hurry to the White Acropolis!

Messages.Name: hint_twn01_e06_tl
Messages.Text:
$Sonic! I think you can get into the station
through that vent, but first you need to
break that wire net.

Messages.Name: hint_twn01_e08_pr
Messages.Text:
$Sonic!
For now, let's run into the jungle over there!

Messages.Name: hint_twn01_e09_pr
Messages.Text:
$If we work together, I'm sure we'll be able to
get across the water!

Messages.Name: hint_twn01_e10_sn
Messages.Text:
$Tails, I've taken Elise back to the castle.
I'll go after Eggman.
Keep me posted!

Messages.Name: hint_twn01_e11_sn
Messages.Text: $Aquatic base?

Messages.Name: hint_twn01_e12_sn
Messages.Text:
$It looks like it's information about Eggman's
secret  base.

Messages.Name: hint_twn01_e13_tl
Messages.Text:
$Sonic, this is bad! Elise has... 
Never mind, I'll tell you later.
Hurry to the Castle Town's altar!

Messages.Name: hint_twn01_e14_an
Messages.Text:
$This is terrible!
Princess Elise went to see Eggman by herself.
Tails, please help her!

Messages.Name: hint_twn01_e15_tl
Messages.Text:
$Elise went to see Eggman all by herself.
I tried to go after her...

Messages.Name: hint_twn01_e16_tl
Messages.Text:
$Eggman will probably go to the ancient castle. 
Let's get there first and save Elise!

Messages.Name: hint_twn01_e17_an
Messages.Text:
$Ancient castle? But to get there... 
You need to pass Soleanna's test.
The bishop will know more.

Messages.Name: hint_twn01_e18_sn
Messages.Text:
$Elise... 
I'll save you this time!

Messages.Name: hint_twn01_e18_tl
Messages.Text:
$Sonic! The door's open!
Let's hurry to Eggman's secret base!

Messages.Name: hint_twn01_e18_kn
Messages.Text:
$Ring three bells at once... 
Sonic, you should be able to do it!

Messages.Name: hint_twn01_e19_an
Messages.Text:
$Soleanna's lab is underneath the castle.
But, after the Duke's death, it has been
shut down and sealed away. $If you can find one of the former
researchers, they may be able to guide you.

Messages.Name: hint_twn01_e20_sv
Messages.Text:
$The "Iblis Trigger"... 
Where is he?
First, I need to gather informationâ€¦

Messages.Name: hint_twn01_e21_sv
Messages.Text:
$I guess I'll head over to the jungle for
starters...

Messages.Name: hint_twn01_e22_am
Messages.Text:
$Did Sonic really head to the desert?
Silver, do me a favor and 
help me find my target first!

Messages.Name: hint_twn01_e23_am
Messages.Text:
$The mayor isn't here?
I wonder where he went... 
What should I do, Silver?

Messages.Name: hint_twn01_e24_sv
Messages.Text:
$Fine... 
I'll show you my power.

Messages.Name: hint_twn01_e25_am
Messages.Text:
$Oh no, Silver!
Eggman's robots are breaking down the gate!
You can do something, right?

Messages.Name: hint_twn01_e26_sv
Messages.Text:
$I know where the mayor is.
Amy, let's go!

Messages.Name: hint_twn01_e27_sv
Messages.Text:
$Why is Amy protecting him?
But I... I must defeat him.

Messages.Name: hint_twn01_e28_am
Messages.Text:
$Man... 
We came all the way here,
and the town's filled with bad guys...

Messages.Name: hint_twn01_e29_am
Messages.Text:
$You stay put.
I'll take them all down!

Messages.Name: hint_twn01_e30_bz
Messages.Text:
$You need to short out the electricity
in order to stop this laser. We'll need to
hit the switches at the same time.

Messages.Name: hint_twn01_e31_sv
Messages.Text:
$Darn!
I can't get in because of the laser.

Messages.Name: hint_twn01_e32_bz
Messages.Text:
$Darn! Why can't I get into the station?
Silver, is there a way to do this 
without being noticed?

Messages.Name: hint_twn01_e33_sv
Messages.Text: $Okay, let's go after Sonic!

Messages.Name: hint_twn01_e34_sv
Messages.Text:
$I'm going to stop Dr. Eggman
no matter what!
Blaze, let's go after him!

Messages.Name: hint_twn01_e35_sv
Messages.Text:
$Wave Ocean?
Ok, let's hurry to the Castle Town!

Messages.Name: hint_twn01_e36_sv
Messages.Text:
$Sonic... 
And who's this?
I'll try to find her!

Messages.Name: hint_twn01_e37_sv
Messages.Text:
$Oh, no... Without her,
I won't be able to find Elise.
I've got to hurry!

Messages.Name: hint_twn01_e38_an
Messages.Text: $Ahhh!

Messages.Name: hint_twn01_e39_sv
Messages.Text: $Where's Sonic!?

Messages.Name: hint_twn01_e40_an
Messages.Text:
$Sonic went to the ancient castle
to find Elise.
The bishop will know more.

Messages.Name: hint_twn01_e41_gn
Messages.Text:
$Rouge, respond.
I've prepared the means to go to Kingdom Valley.
Go to the forest cave immediately!

Messages.Name: hint_twn01_e42_sd
Messages.Text: $Gotta get to the ancient castle extraction point!

Messages.Name: hint_twn01_e43_rg
Messages.Text:
$The bridge is broken!
Shadow, can't you do something?

Messages.Name: hint_twn01_e45_gn
Messages.Text:
$Agent Shadow:
Emergency orders from GUN.
Bandits are loose on the highway. $Use of firearms is authorized.
Capture the bandits immediately!

Messages.Name: hint_twn01_e46_rg
Messages.Text:
$No use fretting... 
We'll just have to wait until
GUN sends the information.

Messages.Name: hint_twn01_e47_gn
Messages.Text:
$Agent Rouge, respond.
Mission recipient E123 Omega located.
He's in the jungle ruins inside the forest.

Messages.Name: hint_twn01_e48_gn
Messages.Text:
$Agent Shadow.
We've lost contact with Agent Rouge.
Head to the warehouse district immediately.

Messages.Name: hint_twn01_e49_sd
Messages.Text:
$The Doctor's traveling by train?
Shoot! I've got to get to the station.

Messages.Name: hint_twn01_e50_gn
Messages.Text:
$Agent Rouge, respond. The location of the
Scepter of Darkness is unknown, but there is an
archaeologist who is researching it. $If you find the archeologist, you might 
get more information.

Messages.Name: hint_twn01_e51_sd
Messages.Text: $Good... Now I can finally stop Mephiles.

Messages.Name: hint_twn01_e52_gn
Messages.Text:
$Agent Shadow.
E123 Omega has engaged Mephiles.
Head to Wave Ocean immediately!

Messages.Name: hint_twn01_h00_so
Messages.Text:
$You can get money by collecting Rings,
and clearing action stages or missions
in towns.

Messages.Name: hint_twn01_h01_so
Messages.Text:
$With the money, you can shop in town!
Go to the stores often to check out the
new items.

Messages.Name: hint_twn01_h02_so
Messages.Text:
$There are a lot of people in town.
Listen to them, and help them.
It may open new paths for you.

Messages.Name: hint_twn01_h03_so
Messages.Text:
$If you see a mark above the head of
someone in town, try talking to them.
You may learn something important!

Messages.Name: hint_twn01_h04_so
Messages.Text:
$This is the Mirror of Soleanna.
It will take you right to your destination
with its magical power.

Messages.Name: hint_twn01_h05_so
Messages.Text:
$This is a Silver medal.
They are scattered all over Soleanna.
It may be hard to collect them all.

Messages.Name: hint_twn01_h06_so
Messages.Text:
$When in doubt, consult your map and
radar. They should tell you exactly where
you need to go next.

Messages.Name: hint_twn01_h07_so
Messages.Text:
$Shadow, you need something to help you
unlock your full potential. $If you can find it, you will have amazing
powers at your command.

Messages.Name: hint_mis01_e00_am
Messages.Text:
$You'll choose me, won't you, Sonic?
I'll be waiting over to the right.

Messages.Name: hint_mis01_e00_pr
Messages.Text:
$Sonic... I've been thinking about you a lot... 
I'll be waiting for you on the left here.

Messages.Name: hint_mis01_e01_am
Messages.Text: $Sonic! You came!

Messages.Name: hint_mis01_e01_pr
Messages.Text: $Sonic! I knew you would come...

Messages.Name: hint_mis01_e02_sn
Messages.Text: $All right, Tails! Let's race to the bell!

Messages.Name: hint_mis01_e02_tl
Messages.Text: $Okay, Sonic! I won't lose!

Messages.Name: hint_mis01_e03_sn
Messages.Text: $Nice try, Tails!

Messages.Name: hint_mis01_e03_tl
Messages.Text: $Yay!

Messages.Name: hint_mis01_e04_sn
Messages.Text: $You're the one that did it!

Messages.Name: hint_mis01_e05_sn
Messages.Text:
$Not going to give up, are you?
All right, I'll take you all on!

Messages.Name: hint_mis01_e06_sn
Messages.Text:
$Okay then... 
Tails, Knuckles, let's do this together! $Just leave it to me!

Messages.Name: hint_mis01_e06_tl
Messages.Text: $Team Sonic is back!

Messages.Name: hint_mis01_e06_kn
Messages.Text: $All right, I'll help ya!

Messages.Name: hint_mis01_e07_sn
Messages.Text: $Okay, let's do this!

Messages.Name: hint_mis01_e07_tl
Messages.Text: $Here you go, Knuckles!

Messages.Name: hint_mis01_e07_kn
Messages.Text: $It's all you, Sonic!

Messages.Name: hint_mis01_e08_am
Messages.Text: $Aaah! What're you doing, Silver?

Messages.Name: hint_mis01_e08_sv
Messages.Text:
$Where is Amy going?
I might be able to learn about Sonic if... 
I'll try following her.

Messages.Name: hint_mis01_e09_am
Messages.Text:
$Sonic...  I hope I can give this to him
the next time I see him...

Messages.Name: hint_mis01_e09_bz
Messages.Text: $Ngh... There's too many enemies.

Messages.Name: hint_mis01_e09_sv
Messages.Text: $Blaze! I'm coming!

Messages.Name: hint_mis01_e10_bz
Messages.Text:
$Silver!
Thank you!

Messages.Name: hint_mis01_e11_rg
Messages.Text:
$Hey, Shadow.
How about a little contest, to see which
one of us is the better special agent?

Messages.Name: hint_mis01_e12_sd
Messages.Text:
$Heh, a waste of time, I suppose.
The answer's obvious anyway.

Messages.Name: hint_mis01_e13_rg
Messages.Text:
$Aw, come on!
Let's go!

Messages.Name: hint_mis01_e14_om
Messages.Text: $Detecting multiple readings on radar!

Messages.Name: hint_mis01_e15_sd
Messages.Text:
$The Doctor's not holding back, is he?
Let him witness my ultimate power!

Messages.Name: hint_all01_w00_sn
Messages.Text: $I better get going soon...

Messages.Name: hint_all01_w00_tl
Messages.Text: $What should I do?

Messages.Name: hint_all01_w00_kn
Messages.Text: $What to do, what to do...

Messages.Name: hint_all01_w00_sd
Messages.Text: $Better get going...

Messages.Name: hint_all01_w00_rg
Messages.Text: $I wonder if there are any jewels around here...

Messages.Name: hint_all01_w00_om
Messages.Text: $Scheduled maintenance overdue...

Messages.Name: hint_all01_w00_am
Messages.Text: $Are we going to rest much longer?

Messages.Name: hint_all01_w00_bz
Messages.Text: $Let's hurry up.

Messages.Name: hint_all01_w00_sv
Messages.Text: $This delay isn't helping...

Messages.Name: hint_all01_w00_pr
Messages.Text: $Are you tired?

Messages.Name: hint_all01_w01_sn
Messages.Text: $yawn

Messages.Name: hint_all01_w01_tl
Messages.Text: $Hmmmm

Messages.Name: hint_all01_w01_kn
Messages.Text: $I can't wait to get going.

Messages.Name: hint_all01_w01_sd
Messages.Text: $I guess there's no hurry...

Messages.Name: hint_all01_w01_rg
Messages.Text: $I wonder if there's treasure around here?

Messages.Name: hint_all01_w01_om
Messages.Text: $Cool-down complete. Combat ready.

Messages.Name: hint_all01_w01_am
Messages.Text: $We've gotta do our best!

Messages.Name: hint_all01_w01_bz
Messages.Text:
$I think I'm rested now.
Shouldn't we get going?

Messages.Name: hint_all01_w01_sv
Messages.Text: $Let's get moving!

Messages.Name: hint_all01_w01_pr
Messages.Text: $Please, take your time.

Messages.Name: hint_kdv01_w00_sn
Messages.Text: $The crest of Soleanna and an eagle... I see.

Messages.Name: hint_kdv01_w01_sn
Messages.Text: $Elise...

Messages.Name: hint_kdv01_w01_sd
Messages.Text: $What a place to choose for an extraction point.

Messages.Name: hint_kdv01_w02_sd
Messages.Text: $That cage...

Messages.Name: hint_kdv01_w02_rg
Messages.Text:
$I wonder if we can find the treasure of
Soleanna?

Messages.Name: hint_kdv01_w02_sv
Messages.Text: $Argh, what a mistake I've made!

Messages.Name: hint_wvo01_w00_tl
Messages.Text: $We've gotta help Sonic!

Messages.Name: hint_wvo01_w00_sd
Messages.Text: $Mephiles... what could he...

Messages.Name: hint_wvo01_w00_rg
Messages.Text: $When this job is over, I wanna come back here.

Messages.Name: hint_wvo01_w00_om
Messages.Text: $Where is Mephiles?

Messages.Name: hint_wvo01_w00_bz
Messages.Text: $Could it really be him?

Messages.Name: hint_tpj01_w00_sn
Messages.Text: $They're coming! Let's hurry!

Messages.Name: hint_tpj01_w00_pr
Messages.Text: $My heart is racing...

Messages.Name: hint_tpj01_w01_sn
Messages.Text: $Elise, are you ready?

Messages.Name: hint_tpj01_w01_pr
Messages.Text: $It's so pretty here...

Messages.Name: hint_tpj01_w02_rg
Messages.Text: $Let's take care of them quickly!

Messages.Name: hint_tpj01_w02_sv
Messages.Text: $Where did Blaze go?

Messages.Name: hint_dtd01_w00_sn
Messages.Text: $What's Eggman plotting?

Messages.Name: hint_dtd01_w00_sd
Messages.Text:
$Mephiles...
Just you wait.

Messages.Name: hint_dtd01_w00_pr
Messages.Text: $This design... It looks like it's from Soleanna.

Messages.Name: hint_dtd01_w01_sd
Messages.Text: $It's just a bit further.

Messages.Name: hint_dtd01_w01_rg
Messages.Text: $Whatever happens, I'll believe.

Messages.Name: hint_dtd01_w01_om
Messages.Text: $Mephiles detected.

Messages.Name: hint_dtd01_w01_am
Messages.Text: $I'll find you, Sonic! No matter what!

Messages.Name: hint_dtd01_w01_sv
Messages.Text: $Just wait, Iblis Trigger...

Messages.Name: hint_wap01_w00_sn
Messages.Text: $This is a pretty cold place for a base.

Messages.Name: hint_wap01_w00_bz
Messages.Text: $Sonic...

Messages.Name: hint_wap01_w01_sn
Messages.Text: $Eggman sure built himself a huge base.

Messages.Name: hint_wap01_w01_tl
Messages.Text: $Brr, its freezing!

Messages.Name: hint_wap01_w01_sd
Messages.Text: $We need to get out of here quickly.

Messages.Name: hint_wap01_w01_rg
Messages.Text: $This treasure... Hehe!

Messages.Name: hint_wap01_w01_sv
Messages.Text: $The truth...

Messages.Name: hint_csc01_w00_sn
Messages.Text: $This is terrible...

Messages.Name: hint_csc01_w00_sd
Messages.Text: $There's no need to stay long.

Messages.Name: hint_csc01_w01_sn
Messages.Text: $I've got to help him!

Messages.Name: hint_csc01_w02_sn
Messages.Text: $If we take too long it'll collapse!

Messages.Name: hint_csc01_w02_bz
Messages.Text: $These flames are nothing!

Messages.Name: hint_csc01_w03_sd
Messages.Text: $You want to test me, do you?

Messages.Name: hint_csc01_w03_sv
Messages.Text: $If this keeps up...

Messages.Name: hint_flc01_w00_sn
Messages.Text: $*phew* It sure is hot here.

Messages.Name: hint_flc01_w00_sd
Messages.Text: $Is this really what our future holds?

Messages.Name: hint_flc01_w00_bz
Messages.Text: $Iblis! This time I'll finish you!

Messages.Name: hint_flc01_w01_sn
Messages.Text: $That cave is huge...

Messages.Name: hint_flc01_w01_kn
Messages.Text: $This terrain is so tough!

Messages.Name: hint_flc01_w01_sd
Messages.Text: $The Chaos Emeralds should be...

Messages.Name: hint_flc01_w01_rg
Messages.Text: $This kind of place is no sweat for Rouge the Bat.

Messages.Name: hint_flc01_w01_sv
Messages.Text:
$I'm close... Just a bit farther...

Iblis! Just you wait!

Messages.Name: hint_rct01_w00_sn
Messages.Text: $We don't have time to stand around!

Messages.Name: hint_rct01_w00_sd
Messages.Text: $If we don't hurry, the doctor will escape!

Messages.Name: hint_rct01_w00_sv
Messages.Text: $I've got to catch up with Sonic!

Messages.Name: hint_rct01_w01_sd
Messages.Text: $I'm going after the Doctor.

Messages.Name: hint_aqa01_w00_sn
Messages.Text: $There's no time. I've got to hurry!

Messages.Name: hint_aqa01_w00_tl
Messages.Text: $Sonic, wait for me!

Messages.Name: hint_aqa01_w00_sd
Messages.Text: $Mephiles, I won't let you escape!

Messages.Name: hint_aqa01_w00_sv
Messages.Text: $Iblis... Mephiles... What's going on?

Messages.Name: hint_aqa01_w01_kn
Messages.Text: $That Eggman!

Messages.Name: hint_aqa01_w01_sd
Messages.Text: $Almost...

Messages.Name: hint_aqa01_w01_sv
Messages.Text: $Iblis... How am I supposed to...

Messages.Name: hint_twn01_e53_rg
Messages.Text:
$What!? A landslide!?
Shadow, can you do something about this?

Messages.Name: hint_all04_h01_so
Messages.Text:
$You will need to collect three keys to open
the door ahead. Search the area carefully.

Messages.Name: hint_rct01_h03_so
Messages.Text:
$At this rate, the train will hit that bomb. You
must make the bomb explode before the train
hits it. Can you find a switch anywhere?

Messages.Name: hint_tpj01_e20_pr
Messages.Text:
$If you jump when the bud is glowing, you may
be able to jump higher.

Messages.Name: hint_tpj01_h04_so
Messages.Text:
$Jump when you see the bud glow. You should
be able to jump higher.

Messages.Name: hint_csc01_e09_sn
Messages.Text:
$Shadow was swept up into the tornado.
I've got to help him!

Messages.Name: hint_csc01_e09_sd
Messages.Text:
$It looks like Sonic was swept up into the
tornado. If I use my Glider...!

Messages.Name: hint_twn01_h08_so
Messages.Text:
Obtain an item to release your power.
Then you can destroy the rocks blocking
your way.

Messages.Name: hint_twn01_h10_so
Messages.Text:
Hold $ button at the highest point during
a jump to perform Psycho Shock. You can send the shock wave by slamming
the ground.

Messages.Name: hint_twn01_h11_so
Messages.Text:
Press the $ button twice in quick succession to
do a Teleport Dash. You can dash in the light speed.

Messages.Name: hint_blaze_kdv_a_sonicinteraction
Messages.Text: $Sonic, leave this to me.

Messages.Name: hint_thanksblaze
Messages.Text: $Thanks, Blaze.
